Title: International Customer Service: The Coolest Weekend Internship
Description:
The coolest weekend internship is here!

Get a chance to work with one of the most iconic brands, interact with international customers, and earn a prestigious certificate and a stipend of    13,000/- that turns heads. And yes, free food, snacks, and beverages too!

All of this in a 8-day weekend internship as per the following schedule:

Onboarding & training (can be in any shift - day shift or the evening shift): 

1. 28th July /13th August (Mon - Fri, onboarding)
2. 17th August (Sun, training)
3. 24th  August (Sun, training)
4. 30th & 31st August (Sat & Sun, training)

Production i.e. actual working (night shift):

1. 7th September (Sun)
2. 14th September(Sun)
3. 21st September (Sun)

What will you do in the internship: 

1. Provide excellent customer service over the phone.
2. Adhere to program-defined quality standards.
3. Stay informed about the latest information and updates.
4. Perform tasks related to voice profiles.

Since the internship requires interacting with international clients, you must possess excellent English-speaking skills. 

You must be comfortable with either the day shift or the evening shift on the training and onboarding dates and night shifts (only) on the production dates. Also, you would need to clear the training to proceed further with the production phase.

The internship location would be in Hyderabad. Please apply to this internship ONLY if you are available on the above dates and shifts and can arrange for your own transport to the office. Other than the stipend, no cab allowance would be provided. Free food/snacks and beverages would be available during cafeteria operating hours.

Title: Digital Marketing
Description:
Are you a savvy digital marketer looking to gain hands-on experience in the industry? Befach company is seeking a dynamic Digital Marketing intern to join our team! 

As a Digital Marketing intern, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects and campaigns while learning from experienced professionals. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting in the development and implementation of social media marketing strategies.
2. Managing and optimizing search engine marketing campaigns.
3. Conducting keyword research and implementing SEO best practices.
4. Creating engaging content for Facebook and Instagram marketing campaigns.
5. Writing compelling copy for email marketing campaigns.
6. Analyzing campaign performance and providing actionable insights.
7. Collaborating with the team to brainstorm new ideas and strategies.

If you have a passion for digital marketing, excellent English proficiency, and a desire to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment, we want to hear from you! Join us at Befach and take the first step towards a successful career in digital marketing.

Title: Operations Manager/Account Manager In Marketing Agency
Description:
Department: Client Servicing/Operations
Reports To: Director/Agency Head

We are looking for a proactive and people-oriented Operations Manager / Account Manager to join our growing digital marketing agency. This role bridges the gap between clients and the internal team, ensuring seamless communication, timely task execution, and exceptional client satisfaction. You will be responsible for understanding client needs, assigning tasks to the right team members with management approval, tracking progress, ensuring timely delivery, and maintaining strong relationships with both clients and team members.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

A. Client management:
1. Understand the needs, goals, and expectations of clients across various digital marketing projects.
2. Act as the key point of contact for clients, ensuring clear and timely communication.
3. Submit project deliverables to clients after internal review and head approval.
4. Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships to ensure client satisfaction and retention.

B. Task coordination & team management:
1. Allocate project tasks to the appropriate team members with prior permission from the head.
2. Monitor project timelines and ensure timely follow-up on task completion.
3. Maintain a transparent task dashboard and regularly update internal progress reports.
4. Coordinate with different departments (design, content, SEO, paid ads, etc.) to ensure alignment on client deliverables.
5. Motivate and encourage the team to perform at their best and meet deadlines.

C. Internal & strategic communication:
1. Act as a communication bridge between the agency head, internal teams, and clients.
2. Escalate issues, risks, or delays to the management proactively.
3. Participate in internal review meetings and contribute to improving workflows and team performance.

Requirements:

1. Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, communications, or a related field.
2. Strong understanding of digital marketing services (SEO, SMM, PPC, Content Marketing, etc.).
3. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
4. Strong organizational and time-management abilities.
5. Ability to handle multiple client accounts and prioritize tasks effectively.
6. A team player with a positive attitude and leadership qualities.

Preferred Skills:

1. Experience with project management tools (e.g., Trello, Asana, ClickUp).
2. Familiarity with CRM and reporting software.
3. Basic understanding of Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Slides) and Microsoft Office tools.

Why Join Us?

1. Creative and growth-driven work environment
2. Opportunity to work with a diverse set of clients
3. Scope for leadership and career advancement
4. Energetic, supportive team culture

Title: AI Agent Development
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Build, test, and optimize multi-agent systems using frameworks like CrewAI, LangGraph, and LangChain.
2. Design autonomous agent workflows with tools like n8n and LangChain Expression Language (LCEL).
3. Use Pydantic AI to define agent schemas, context managers, and validation pipelines.
4. Connect LLMs (OpenAI, Ollama, Mistral, etc.) with tools, memory, vector stores, and real-world actions.
5. Develop agent teams to collaborate on complex tasks like document parsing, job matching, data reconciliation, and API orchestration.
6. Integrate and orchestrate AI agents with external APIs, databases (e.g., Supabase, PostgreSQL), and cloud services.
7. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, engineering, and design to scope and refine use cases.
8. Create documentation, prompt templates, test cases, and workflow demos for different agent setups.

Required Skills:

1. Solid understanding of Python and asynchronous programming (asyncio, aiohttp, etc.).
2. Familiarity with LangChain, CrewAI, or similar agentic/LLM frameworks.
3. Hands-on experience with n8n or any automation/orchestration tool (Zapier, Airflow, etc.).
4. Knowledge of prompt engineering, tool calling, and memory integration in LLM pipelines.
5. Comfortable working with REST APIs, Webhooks, and JSON-based data models.
Basic experience with Git and collaborative development.

Are you a female looking to kickstart your career in Events, PR, and Marketing? Look no further! Our PAN India Group company is seeking dynamic Management Trainees to join our team. As an intern, you will have the opportunity to learn and grow in a fast-paced and exciting work environment. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in planning and executing events, promotions, and marketing campaigns
2. Develop and maintain relationships with clients, vendors, and media contacts
3. Create engaging content for social media platforms and the website
4. Conduct market research and analysis to identify trends and opportunities
5. Coordinate logistics for events and promotional activities
6. Prepare reports and presentations using MS-Office and MS-Excel
7. Collaborate with team members to achieve departmental goals and objectives

If you have excellent communication skills, proficiency in MS-Office and MS-Excel, and a passion for events and marketing, we want to hear from you! Join us as a Management Trainee and take the first step towards a successful career in the industry. Apply now and unleash your potential!

Title: Founder’s Office – Startup Operations & Support
Description:
You will be working directly with the founders and helping with various company tasks. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Daily operations support (vendor coordination, procurement, inventory tracking)
2. Updating Excel/Google Sheets (sales, expenses, inventory logs)
3. Creating basic Canva designs (for social media or promotions)
4. Research and market analysis (e.g. packaging vendors, competitor pricing)
5. On-ground tasks like visiting vendors or stores in the city
6. Supporting order management and customer service when needed
7. Helping document SOPs and organize digital files

Who we're looking for:

1. Smart, organized, and comfortable with variety
2. Good with Excel/Sheets and Canva
3. Has strong ownership and attention to detail
4. Comfortable with both desk work and on-ground errands
5. Willing to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment
6. Bonus: Interest in food, baking, or design

4. Assist in drafting and distributing internal communication materials

If you are a proactive and detail-oriented individual looking to kickstart your career in HR, this internship at ERIC Robotics PSIPL is the perfect opportunity for you to learn and grow in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. Apply now and join our team of passionate professionals!

Description:
1. Assist in sourcing candidates through job portals and social media platforms.

Title: Human Resources (HR)
Description:

Title: Content and Social Media Marketing
Description:
As a Social Media Marketing intern at Slimjim, you will have the opportunity to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment where your creativity and digital marketing skills will be put to the test. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Creating engaging content, Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts for our social media platforms, including Facebook and Instagram, to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to our website.
2. Create pages, posts, and content and implement it on the website
3. Write blogs on relevant topics weekly
4. Implementing SEO strategies to improve our online brand and product visibility and boost our search engine rankings.
5. Assisting in the development and execution of Facebook and Instagram marketing campaigns to reach our target audience effectively.
6. Utilizing your strong English writing skills to craft compelling copy for social media posts, emails, and other marketing materials.
7. Collaborating with the designing team to brainstorm new ideas and initiatives to engage our followers and grow our online community.
8. Monitoring and analyzing social media metrics to track the success of our campaigns and make data-driven recommendations for improvement.
9. Assisting with whatsapp marketing campaigns to nurture leads and drive conversions.

If you are a creative and driven individual with a passion for social media, this internship is the perfect opportunity for you to gain hands-on experience and make a real impact on our brand's digital presence. Join us at Slimjim and help us take our online marketing efforts to the next level!

Title: Channel Sales (Field Sales)
Description:
As a channel sales intern, you'll work directly with the founding team and play a
hands-on role in shaping the future of an FMCG startup. This is not a desk job     it's a ground-up experience designed for go-getters.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Understand our business model, especially the distributor-led sales ecosystem
2. Support in building and streamlining our channel sales vertical from scratch
3. Assist in onboarding new distributors, enabling smooth handovers and training
4. Contribute to expanding new markets - research, outreach, and relationship-building
5. Hone your skills in negotiation, deal-making, and closures

What's in it for you?:

1. Real-time exposure to FMCG channel sales and startup hustle
2. Learnings from seasoned industry leaders and mentors    Mastery in negotiation, sales closures, marketing strategy
3. Ownership of your work - your impact will be visible, measurable, and celebrated
4. Experience in both B2B (distribution)
5. Certificate & letter of recommendation; PPO opportunity for top performers

Title: International Customer Service: The Coolest Weekend Internship
Description:
The coolest weekend internship is here!

Get a chance to work with one of the most iconic brands, interact with international customers, and earn a prestigious certificate and a stipend of    13,000/- that turns heads. And yes, free food, snacks, and beverages too!

All of this in a 8-day weekend internship as per the following schedule:

Onboarding & training (can be in any shift - day shift or the evening shift): 

1. 28th July /13th August (Mon - Fri, onboarding)
2. 17th August (Sun, training)
3. 24th  August (Sun, training)
4. 30th & 31st August (Sat & Sun, training)

Production i.e. actual working (night shift):

1. 7th September (Sun)
2. 14th September(Sun)
3. 21st September (Sun)

What will you do in the internship: 

1. Provide excellent customer service over the phone.
2. Adhere to program-defined quality standards.
3. Stay informed about the latest information and updates.
4. Perform tasks related to voice profiles.

Since the internship requires interacting with international clients, you must possess excellent English-speaking skills. 

You must be comfortable with either the day shift or the evening shift on the training and onboarding dates and night shifts (only) on the production dates. Also, you would need to clear the training to proceed further with the production phase.

The internship location would be in Hyderabad. Please apply to this internship ONLY if you are available on the above dates and shifts and can arrange for your own transport to the office. Other than the stipend, no cab allowance would be provided. Free food/snacks and beverages would be available during cafeteria operating hours.

Title: Graphic Design Intern
Description:
At Memory Bank, we believe that every child's artwork is a little piece of magic. As a graphic design intern, you'll be at the heart of transforming these raw sketches and doodles into something truly special. You'll take the whimsical and heartfelt creations of children and bring them to life through design, turning them into personalized keepsakes, books, and digital art that families will treasure forever. You won't just be creating visuals; you'll be preserving memories, one artwork at a time. If you're passionate about design, excited by the idea of working on something meaningful, and eager to help tell stories through creativity, we want you on our team.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design creation & conceptualization: Independently take design briefs, research ideas, and conceptualize visual solutions, creating logos, illustrations, banners, thumbnails, and social media assets.
2. End-to-end design management: Manage the entire design process   starting from ideation, creating assets, and iterating based on feedback to final delivery of designs that meet the client's needs.
3. Digital & print assets: Produce designs for both digital platforms (social media, websites, email campaigns) and print materials (brochures, flyers, etc.).
4. Brand consistency: Ensure that all design work aligns with established brand guidelines and maintains visual consistency across various platforms.
5. Thumbnail editing & adaptation: Adapt and resize thumbnails and digital assets for various platforms, ensuring they are eye-catching and optimized for performance.
6. Client interaction: Communicate directly with clients to understand their requirements and feedback, ensuring that your designs meet their expectations.
7. Revisions & refinement: Incorporate client feedback to revise and refine designs, delivering final work that aligns with project goals and brand aesthetics.
8. File management: Organize and maintain a digital filing system for all design assets, ensuring easy access to project files and proper documentation.
9. Trend awareness & innovation: Stay updated with the latest design trends and apply fresh, innovative techniques to your work.
10. Use of AI tools: Leverage AI-driven design tools to streamline workflows, improve creativity, and deliver innovative design solutions.

At Traya, we're on a mission to help people take control of their hair health by treating the root cause of hair loss with a science-backed, holistic approach. We combine Dermatology, Ayurveda, and Nutrition to create personalized solutions that work. We're looking for a Telugu Content Writer Intern who can create compelling, culturally relevant content in Telugu. If you have a flair for storytelling, a strong command of both Telugu and English, and want to learn the ropes of digital content creation, this role is for you.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Content writing & editing: Write high-quality content in Telugu for social media, blogs, ads, website, and more.
2. Localization & adaptation: Help adapt existing content into Telugu, ensuring cultural and linguistic relevance.
3. Content strategy support: Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and implement content ideas that resonate with Telugu-speaking audiences.
4. Proofreading & quality checks: Ensure all content is error-free, aligned with brand tone, and grammatically accurate.
5. Execution: Assist in content planning, scheduling, and publishing in coordination with the marketing team.

Requirements: 

1. Proficiency in Telugu (written) is a must.
2. Strong English communication skills, both written and verbal.
3. Prior experience or internship in content writing or digital marketing preferred.
4. Passion for storytelling, digital content, and regional language media.
Bonus: Ability to speak/write in Tamil as well.

What You'll Gain:

1. Hands-on exposure to content creation in a fast-paced startup.
2. Mentorship and learning from an experienced creative and marketing team.
3. Opportunity to work on real-time brand campaigns and storytelling.
4. A potential pathway to a full-time role based on performance.

Title: Microbiologist – Microalgae Isolation & Screening
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

A. Sample collection & isolation: Collect water and soil samples from local lakes, ponds, and wetlands.
Perform microalgae isolation using enrichment and serial dilution techniques.

B. Screening & characterization: 
1. Use microscopy, staining, and culture techniques to identify algae strains.
2. Optimize growth conditions (light, nutrients, CO    levels) for different species.
3. Conduct CO    absorption efficiency tests for selected strains.

C. Biochemical Analysis (Preferred): Analyze chlorophyll content and photosynthetic efficiency.

D. Documentation & reporting:
1. Maintain detailed lab records of isolated strains and experimental results.
2. Prepare reports on promising algae species for air purification applications

4. Build and nurture strong relationships with clients, sponsors, and key industry stakeholders.
5. Support the execution of strategic marketing campaigns across digital platforms and offline media to enhance brand visibility.
6. Participate in detailed event planning and help ensure seamless on-ground coordination and execution.

You'll work closely with founders and the customer operations team to onboard users, support adoption, gather feedback, and drive value at every step of the client journey. This is a unique opportunity to understand how great SaaS products scale through customer empathy, proactive problem-solving, and strong internal collaboration.

Title: Social Media Marketing
Description:
1. Create Engaging Content: Come up with fun, interesting posts for our social media accounts (like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.) that people will love and want to share.

2. Grow Our Followers: Use your creative ideas and marketing skills to increase our followers on all our social media platforms.

3. Interact with Our Audience: Chat with and respond to comments and messages from our followers to keep them engaged and feeling valued.

4. Stay Up-to-Date: Keep yourself informed about the latest social media trends and tools so our strategies are always fresh and effective.

5. SEO Knowledge: Understand the basics of SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and how it can help improve the visibility and reach of our social media content.

6. Collaborate with the Team: Work with our marketing and content teams to ensure that our social media strategy aligns with our overall brand goals.

7. Track Performance: Monitor our social media accounts to see how well our posts are doing. Use tools to track engagement, likes, shares, and other key metrics.

8. Create a Content Calendar: Plan ahead by scheduling posts in advance, ensuring a consistent and steady flow of content on all platforms.

9. Boost Posts: Use paid advertising methods when needed to amplify our reach and get our content in front of more people.

10. Provide Reports: Regularly update the team with simple reports showing what's working and what's not, and suggest improvements to make our social media presence even better.

Title: Fashion Design And Merchandising

As a Fashion Design and Merchandising intern at Celebria Collective, you will have the opportunity to work alongside our talented team of designers and merchandisers to create innovative and trendsetting collections. With your expertise in CorelDRAW, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, CLO3D, and Design Thinking, you will play a crucial role in bringing our creative vision to life. 

Key Responsibilities:
1. Assist in designing and developing new concepts for our upcoming collections
2. Create detailed technical drawings and digital renderings using CorelDRAW, Adobe Photoshop, and Adobe Illustrator
3. Collaborate with the merchandising team to analyze market trends and consumer preferences
4. Utilize CLO3D to create virtual samples and prototypes for fittings and presentations
5. Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute fresh ideas for product development
6. Conduct research on emerging trends, materials, and techniques in the fashion industry
7. Support the team in day-to-day tasks such as organizing samples, preparing presentations, and attending fittings and meetings. 

This internship will provide you with hands-on experience in all aspects of the fashion design and merchandising process, and the opportunity to grow and develop your skills in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. Join us at Celebria Collective and be a part of something truly special!

Title: Telugu Audio Recording – Native Speakers
Description:
We are looking for fluent Telugu speakers to participate in a one-time audio recording project. If you have excellent speaking skills, strong attention to detail, and are proficient in Telugu, this could be a perfect opportunity for you!

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Record audio in Telugu on assigned topics, ensuring clarity, fluency, and accuracy.
2. Stick to the given topic and cover all required subpoints without deviating.
3. Use the specified mobile app for all recordings.
4. Record in a quiet environment to ensure clear, noise-free audio.
5. Maintain a stable internet connection and stay fully focused during the recording-no multitasking.
6. Always maintain professional conduct-avoid inappropriate, offensive, or discriminatory language, and refrain from sharing personal information.

Note: 

1. We need only male speakers.
2. Each participant will record 220 short phrases provided on the platform.
3. This is a one-time project. All recordings will be completed using a mobile app.

Title: Kannada Audio Recording – Native Speakers
Description:
We are currently seeking fluent Kannada speakers to participate in an ongoing audio recording project. If you have strong verbal skills, attention to detail, and are confident speaking Kannada clearly, this is a great one-time opportunity to contribute to a meaningful language dataset.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Record 220 short Kannada phrases using a provided mobile app.
2. Maintain clear and fluent pronunciation throughout.
3. Stick strictly to Kannada   no mixing with other languages.
4. Follow the provided prompts and stay on topic   no improvisation.
5. Ensure recordings are done in a quiet, noise-free environment.
6. Maintain a stable internet connection and focus fully   no multitasking.
7. Uphold professional standards   avoid inappropriate language and never share personal information.

Notes :

Requirement: Male speakers only.
Duration: One-time task.
Platform: Mobile application (details will be shared upon selection).
Language: Native-level Kannada fluency required.

Title: Digital Marketing
Description:
As a digital marketing intern at Propbutlers, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects and gain hands-on experience in the world of digital marketing. Your knowledge of Facebook marketing, Instagram marketing, social media marketing, Google AdWords, Canva, SEO, and SEM will be put to the test as you help us reach our target audience and drive engagement across various platforms. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop and execute social media marketing campaigns to increase brand awareness and engagement.
2. Create compelling content for our social media channels to attract and retain followers.
3. Manage Google AdWords campaigns to drive traffic and conversions.
4. Optimize website content and structure for improved SEO performance.
5. Utilize Canva to create visually appealing graphics for our digital marketing efforts.
6. Monitor and report on the performance of digital marketing campaigns using analytics tools.
7. Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing to continually improve our strategies. 

If you are a creative and ambitious individual looking to kickstart your career in digital marketing, this internship is perfect for you. Join us at Propbutlers and make a real impact on our online presence!

Title: Graphic Design
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Design engaging creatives for social media and marketing
2. Work on logo and brand identity design

4. Assist in packaging and brochure designs

Title: Interior Design
Description:
Are you a talented and creative Interior Design student looking for an exciting internship opportunity? Join Stirring Minds, a cutting-edge design firm, and gain valuable hands-on experience in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. As an Interior Design intern, you will have the opportunity to work with industry professionals and collaborate on a variety of projects. 

Key Responsibilities:
1. Assist in creating innovative and aesthetically pleasing design concepts using AutoCAD, Adobe Photoshop, Google SketchUp, and Autodesk 3ds Max.
2. Collaborate with senior designers to develop detailed drawings and renderings for client presentations.
3. Conduct research on current design trends and materials to enhance project outcomes.
4. Participate in site visits and meetings with clients to understand their needs and preferences.
5. Support project managers in coordinating schedules, budgets, and timelines for various design projects.
6. Contribute creative ideas and solutions to enhance the overall design process.
7. Gain valuable real-world experience and build a strong portfolio to kickstart your career in interior design.

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to expand your skills and knowledge in the field of interior design. Apply now and take the first step towards an exciting career with Stirring Minds!

Title: Animation
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Collaborate with game designers and developers to create 2D character animations, environmental animations, and UI animations for our games.
2. Assist in developing storyboards and animation sequences that align with the game's visual style and narrative.
3. Learn and utilize animation software (e.g., Adobe Animate, Spine, Toon Boom) to create fluid animations for characters and assets.
4. Participate in play testing sessions to gather feedback and iterate on animations based on player experience.
5. Support the animation team in revising and polishing animations to ensure they meet project quality standards.
6. Contribute creative ideas during brainstorming sessions for new game features and animations.
7. Stay informed about the latest trends and techniques in-game animation to bring innovative concepts to the team

Title: Lead Generation

5. Schedule meetings or demos for the sales team with high-potential leads.
6. Maintain and update lead data in CRM systems (like HubSpot, Notion, or Kraya AI).
7. Analyze outreach performance and suggest improvements to conversion strategies.

Title: Video Editor
Description:
We are looking for a talented YouTube Video Editor intern to join our team at Aadi Foundation! If you are passionate about creating engaging and visually stunning content, then this is the perfect opportunity for you. As an intern with us, you will have the chance to work on exciting projects and gain valuable experience in the world of video editing.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Edit and enhance video content for our YouTube channel using Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe After Effects.
2. Collaborate with our creative team to brainstorm ideas and concepts for video projects.
3. Create eye-catching thumbnails and graphics using Canva to attract viewers to our videos.
4. Ensure that all video content aligns with our brand guidelines and messaging.
5. Assist with video shoots and provide support to our videographers as needed.
6. Stay up-to-date on the latest trends in video editing and implement new techniques to improve our content.
7. Help with other tasks related to video production and editing as assigned by the team. 

If you are a motivated and creative individual with strong editing skills, we would love to hear from you! Join us at Aadi Foundation and make a difference through the power of video content. Apply now and showcase your talent!

Title: Content and Social Media Marketing
Description:
We are seeking someone who can help us expand, manage, and grow our portfolio of social media accounts across major platforms such as Instagram, YouTube, etc. This role involves both the creation of new accounts and the acquisition (purchase) of existing ones, followed by strategic management and audience growth initiatives.  

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Identify opportunities to acquire existing accounts like Instagram, YouTube, and others with high growth or niche potential.  
2. Create new content-driven accounts from scratch, aligned with content strategy and target audience goals.  
3. Manage day-to-day operations of multiple accounts: posting, engaging, optimizing content, and monitoring performance.  
4. Develop and implement growth strategies including content calendars, hashtag strategies, reels/shorts, collaborations, and giveaways.  
5. Work closely with the content, design, and marketing teams to maintain a consistent brand voice and aesthetic.  
6. Track performance metrics and KPIs to assess account health and growth (followers, engagement, reach, etc.).  
7. Stay on top of social media trends, platform updates, and best practices to optimize account performance.  

Requirements:  

1. Familiarity with content creation tools (e.g., Canva, CapCut, Adobe Suite) and platform analytics.  
2. Strategic thinker with a growth mindset and data-driven decision-making ability.  
3. Strong understanding of content virality, audience targeting, and platform algorithms.  
4. Ability to multitask, stay organized, and manage multiple accounts effectively.  
5. Experience in acquiring or flipping social media pages (preferred but not mandatory).

Title: Business Development
Description:
Are you a driven professional with a passion for sustainability and a knack for building strategic relationships? Energy Alternatives India (EAI), India's leading climate tech and sustainability consulting firm, is looking for young Business Development Interns to help us scale our impact across India's clean energy and climate innovation landscape.

As part of our dynamic team, you will play a key role in identifying opportunities, developing business plans, and promoting consulting and solution offerings in the sustainability domain.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1.  Identify and pursue new high-impact and high-value business opportunities in clean energy, climate tech, and related sectors
2.  Work with leadership to explore new revenue streams and partnerships with new and existing clients
3.  Prepare compelling business proposals, capability decks, and tailored pitches for corporate clients and startups
4.  Develop and manage a pipeline of clients through outreach, relationship building, and strategic follow-ups
5.  Monitor market and competitor activities, and share insights to shape strategic decisions  
6.  Leverage EAI's flagship platforms   especially the CLIMAFIX Summit,   to unlock relevant business opportunities and forge strategic collaborations.
7.  Collaborate with internal teams to create solution offerings and go-to-market strategies
8.  Represent EAI at industry events, webinars, and conferences to expand our network and visibility

Title: Social Media Marketing
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. YouTube Channel Growth & Optimization  
2. Implement A/B testing for thumbnails, titles, and content formats to maximize reach and retention.  
3. Develop and maintain a consistent publishing schedule and content calendar.  
4. Analyze performance metrics (CTR, retention, watch time, etc.) and implement data-backed improvements.  
5. Monitor YouTube algorithm changes and trends to stay ahead of the curve.  
6. Suggest and implement content formats (Shorts, long-form, playlists) to boost channel performance.  
7. Manage community interactions - comments, polls, and audience feedback.  
8. Plan and post content aligned with YouTube videos to drive traffic and build brand presence.  
9. Coordinate with creative/content teams to repurpose YouTube videos into shorts/reels.  
10. Track performance and generate monthly reports with insights and actionable recommendations.  

Requirements:

1. Deep understanding of YouTube algorithms, SEO, monetization, and content best practices.  
2. Proficient with YouTube Studio, Google Analytics, and social media management tools.  
3. Strong communication and copywriting skills.  
4. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.  
5. A passion for content creation, storytelling, and audience engagement.

Title: Telephone Sales Representative
Description:
We are looking for someone who can speak fluent Hindi and is good at talking to people on the phone. Your job will be to speak to people who are interested in our products, understand their problems, and help them place an order.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Handle incoming leads and understand their health issues.
2. Initiate outbound sales calls in Hindi using a provided script.
3. Build trust by listening to the customer's problems and asking guided questions about their health.
4. Introduce the product offering and its benefits.
5. Address objections confidently and respectfully.
6. Close the sale by getting verbal confirmation of interest.
7. Collaborate with backend team to ship the products.
8. Maintain records of daily calls, outcomes, and follow-ups.
9. Ensure calls are brief, clear, and goal-oriented.

Requirements:

1. Fluent Hindi speaker (mandatory). Other Indian languages are a bonus.
2. Strong verbal communication and listening skills.
3. Empathetic, confident, and persuasive on the phone.
4. Ability to follow structured scripts and probe effectively.
5. Prior experience in telesales or customer service is a plus.
6. Comfortable using a basic mobile phone and WhatsApp (no laptop use involved).
7. Must be organized and able to maintain written records manually.

Working Style:

1. You'll be provided with a mobile phone, SIM card for calling, WhatsApp access
2. Leads are provided daily; no cold calling required.
3. You're expected to handle all calls promptly, with a focus on quality over quantity.

Perks:

1. Training provided with sample scripts and objection-handling tips
2. Opportunity to work in the booming wellness and Ayurveda sector

Title: Graphic Design
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

A. Poster & creative design:
1. Design daily/weekly posters for promotions, WhatsApp broadcasts, dealer schemes, giveaways, etc.
2. Create eye-catching product showcase posters (e.g., starter motor, carbon brush, wiper motor).
3. Develop festival-specific or event-based creatives (independence day, dussehra, mechanic day, etc.).

B. Social media & whatsapp content:
1. Design square/vertical visuals for Instagram posts, stories, and reels.
2. Create templates for WhatsApp creatives that can be reused for different products or offers.

C. Catalog & marketing material updates:
1. Help in formatting and updating product catalogs, flyers, and brochures.
2. Design dealer onboarding kits, price list covers, or envelope artwork.

D. product image editing:
1. clean and enhance product photos to be used in creatives and on the website.
2. add branding, background, and technical highlights to images.

E. Brand consistency:
1. Ensure all creatives follow geo's branding     colors, fonts, logo placement, and tone.
2. Help build and maintain a central design library of reusable templates and design assets.

F. Creative brainstorming:
1. Participate in short meetings or brainstorming sessions to generate fresh ideas for upcoming promotions.
2. Suggest content ideas for videos, jingle posters, or mechanic-focused campaigns.

G. File management & delivery:
1. Export files in the correct formats for print (pdf, high-res jpg) and digital (web-optimized png).
2. Organize design files neatly in folders (cloud or shared drive) for easy access by the team.

Note: The candidate is only willing to work from the office for a maximum of 2-3 days per month.

Title: Video Editor
Description:

Title: Content Creation
Description:
WishLuck is looking for a passionate Content Creation Intern who can shoot, edit, and confidently face the camera!  If you're someone who can turn parenting ideas into viral reels     this is your chance to shine.

2. Write hooks and ideas that connect with parents & kids

4. Collaborate with the marketing & product team

3. You love storytelling and short-form content

What you'll learn from us:

2. What made WishLuck one of India's most loved kids' brands

At WishLuck, we're not just selling toys   we're reimagining childhood.

Title: Content Writing
Description:
Emergent is the first truly agentic coding platform that transforms natural language into production-grade, full-stack applications. We're not just another coding tool   we're the vibecoding revolution that empowers anyone to build ambitious products without traditional development constraints. We're seeking a viral content marketer who lives and breathes social media virality. You'll be the creative force behind Emergent's explosive growth on social media, crafting content that doesn't just get views - it gets people to take action.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

A. Content strategy & creation:
1. Develop viral content strategies across our own social accounts (TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts)
2. Write compelling scripts that turn complex tech concepts into digestible, shareable content
3. Identify trending topics, sounds, and formats to leverage for maximum reach
4. Create content calendars that balance educational, entertaining, and promotional content

B. Viral content development:
1. Research and analyze viral patterns in tech, startup, and creator economy spaces
2. Transform Emergent's product capabilities into scroll-stopping hook-driven content
3. Write scripts for demo videos, testimonials, before/after transformations, and product showcases
4. Develop recurring content series and formats that build audience anticipation

C. Community & trend management:
1. Monitor social media trends and identify opportunities for Emergent to participate authentically
2. Engage with comments, collaborate with other creators, and build genuine community
3. Track performance metrics and iterate on content based on data insights
4. Coordinate with video editors to ensure scripts translate effectively to visual content

Essential to have:

1. Proven track record: You've built a social media page from 0 to significant following (10K+ followers) through original content
2. Platform expertise: Deep understanding of TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts algorithms and best practices
3. Writing Excellence: Ability to write hooks that stop scrolling within 3 seconds
4. Tech savvy: comfortable explaining complex technical concepts in simple, engaging ways
5. AI-first: You know how to use AI tools and automate a lot of mundane tasks!

Title: Sales and Marketing
Description:
Buffalo Extraction Systems Private Limited is seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented sales and marketing intern to join our growing team. This role is ideal for a proactive individual looking to gain hands-on experience in sales, marketing, and business development within a dynamic industry. The intern will play a crucial role in enhancing our client outreach strategies, identifying new business opportunities, and contributing to our overall market understanding.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

A. Client data verification & enrichment:
1. Conduct in-depth research to verify and enrich existing client data, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
2. Utilize various online tools and resources to gather comprehensive information on current clients.

B. Competitive analysis:
1. Perform a thorough competitive analysis to identify key trends, market positioning, and strategies of competitors within the industry.
2. Analyze competitor strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats (SWOT).

C. Lead generation & prospect research:
1. Identify and research new potential leads for Buffalo Extraction Systems.
2. Gather detailed information about prospective companies, including their business model, target audience, and current challenges.
3. Utilize news, blogs, social media posts, industry publications, and other relevant sources to identify potential points of contact and understand their business needs.

D. Value proposition development support:
1. Assist in identifying how Buffalo Extraction Systems products/services can add value to the business or expansion plans of prospective clients.
2. Help formulate initial contact strategies based on research findings.

E. Market intelligence:
1. Stay updated on industry trends, market shifts, and emerging opportunities.
2. Contribute to reports and presentations summarizing research findings.

What You'll Gain:

1. Hands-on experience in sales, marketing, and business development.
2. Opportunity to contribute to real-world business strategies.
3. Mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals.
4. Exposure to a dynamic and growing industry.
5. Development of critical research, analytical, and communication skills.

Title: Business Development (Sales)
Description:
Sales & Business Development Intern

Company: Sevencore Pvt. Ltd.
 Location: On-site - [City, State if needed]
 Duration: 6 Months (Pre-Placement Offer Available)
 Timing: 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM (Mon-Friday, Saturday - 10 to 2)

     About Us
At Sevencore Pvt. Ltd., we help businesses grow through cutting-edge app development, digital marketing, and website solutions. Our culture blends performance with purpose     rooted in spiritual awareness, self-responsibility, and innovation. We are now opening opportunities for growth-minded students and freshers to kickstart their journey in sales and business development.

     Key Responsibilities
As a Sales & Business Development Intern, you'll work closely with the senior sales team and leadership to:
Conduct cold calling and manage outreach campaigns
Generate and qualify leads across different platforms
Schedule and coordinate demo meetings with potential clients
Maintain CRM or reporting systems to track sales funnel progress
Research market trends, competition, and business prospects
Support in crafting proposals, pitches, and marketing material
Learn & apply modern sales techniques and client engagement strategies

     Training & Growth
Get guided training from company directors and senior mentors
Access to online courses (e.g., Udemy, etc.) to boost your skills
Hands-on exposure to the real-world startup ecosystem
Pre-Placement Offer (PPO) available based on performance
Opportunity to earn performance-based bonuses

    Who Can Apply
We're looking for highly motivated individuals who:
Are currently pursuing or recently graduated from BBA/MBA or any non-technical field
Are freshers or college students with a strong interest in business & client relationships
Possess excellent communication, persuasion, and interpersonal skills
Are disciplined, confident, and eager to learn modern digital tools
Are fluent in English and local languages

     What Sets Us Apart
We're not just another company     we're a community of conscious individuals growing together. We foster a work environment rooted in:
Spiritual Practices (meditation, breathwork, energy balance)
Self-responsibility & ownership of work
Innovation, collaboration, and inner growth
Exposure to leadership, real clients, and strategic thinking

     Compensation
First 3 months: Unpaid training period
Post 3 months: Performance-based stipend or incentive possible
Bonus: Performance bonuses may be offered for client conversions

     How to Apply
If you're passionate about building a career in sales, while growing personally and professionally, send your resume to [Your Email ID or Application Link] with the subject line:
 "Application for Sales & BD Internship - [Digisha Zankat]

Title: Product Curation And Sales Trainee
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Inventory assessment and categorisation: Assess and systematically categorise the existing inventory, including tumbles, clusters, raw stones, and other variants.
2. Thematic kit creation: Curate crystal kits based on metaphysical properties and customer needs (e.g., emotional balance, abundance, chakra alignment)
3. Kit development: Design & develop various components of each kit.
4. Bundle creation & campaign planning: Develop product bundles for B2C (e.g., daily use, intention-based kits, gifting) and B2B (e.g., corporate gifting or events), including seasonal campaigns, live events, and clearance sales.
5. Content & messaging: Draft crystal care messages, metaphysical descriptions, and usage guidelines.
6. Coordination & communication: Coordinate with the design/content team to create product inserts, kit instructions, and packaging tags.
7. Prepare a product FAQ, size guides, and pricing templates for team use.
8. Maintain an updated product master list with SKUs, prices, sizes, combos, and discounts.
9. Sales support & strategic input: Align curation with customer interest and high-conversion items, assist in creating offer calendars, combo pricing, and feedback collection templates, and Support live sales events (e.g., mystery bags, clearance offers).
10. Product presentation & documentation: Support photo documentation and live product showcasing via WhatsApp or other platforms
11. Create various pitch decks as required.
12. Maintain product inventory trackers and flag low-stock or high-movement items.
13. Pipeline management: Ensure seamless execution across the product lifecycle - from curation to final sale.

Title: Graphic Design
Description:
Company: Pace Pivot Pvt Ltd
Location: Remote/Hybrid (India)
Experience: 0-2 years
Portfolio Required: Behance or similar

About Pace Pivot Pvt Ltd
Pace Pivot is a fast-growing creative and performance agency focused on scaling brands on Amazon. We specialize in high-converting product listing images, A+ and Premium A+ content, and brand stores that blend powerful storytelling with strategic design.

We're looking for a Graphic Designer who may be a fresher but has strong creative instincts, a solid design hand, and a killer portfolio to match. If you're obsessed with e-commerce visuals, understand what drives a customer to "Add to Cart," and love building scroll-stopping visuals, this role is for you.

What You'll Do
Design Amazon product listing images that showcase product features, benefits, and usage with clarity and visual appeal.
Create A+ and Premium A+ Content modules that bring a brand's story to life while aligning with Amazon's guidelines.
Collaborate with content and strategy teams to develop creative briefs and execute compelling visuals for product pages, brand storefronts, and campaign creatives.
Maintain a strong sense of design consistency across all assets while optimizing for both desktop and mobile views.
Work on infographics, lifestyle mockups, and brand storytelling through visuals for multiple categories.
Ensure all creatives meet Amazon's compliance and image policy standards.

What You Must Have
A strong design portfolio (Behance or equivalent) showing e-commerce work, especially product listing images, A+ content, or related visuals.
Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator. Bonus if you know After Effects, Premiere Pro, or Figma.
A solid grasp of visual hierarchy, layout design, typography, and e-commerce best practices.
Awareness of how visuals drive buying decisions on Amazon.
Ability to handle multiple brands and deliver within tight timelines.
Willingness to take feedback, iterate, and learn fast.

Good To Have
Internship or freelance experience in Amazon-first content or D2C brands.
Experience designing for mobile-first product pages.
Understanding of Amazon image guidelines, A+ compliance, and brand store layouts.

Familiarity with lifestyle mockups, 3D renders, or AI-powered design tools.

Why Work With Pace Pivot?
Work on Live Brands: Build your portfolio fast with real-time brand projects.
Training & Mentorship: Learn from senior Amazon strategists and creative leads.
Creative Growth: We encourage you to experiment, push boundaries, and try new design approaches.
Fast-Paced Learning: Multiple categories, multiple styles   no two days are the same.
Collaborative Culture: We win together. Feedback, support, and innovation are part of our DNA.

If you're excited to create visuals that convert, tell a story, and make a brand shine   send us your work.
We're hiring now. Let's build something amazing.

Title: Talent Acquisition
Description:
Position: Talent Acquisition Intern
Location: Vashi, Navi Mumbai (On-site)
Duration: 6 Months
Start Date: Immediate

About Grexa AI
At Grexa AI, we're on a mission to democratize access to powerful AI tools     bringing enterprise-grade intelligence to the fingertips of local and small businesses.
Our founding team previously built Testbook, India's leading EdTech platform with over 25M+ users. Now, we're focused on empowering the backbone of the Indian economy     SMEs     through AI-first solutions.
If you're excited about building real-world products, learning fast, and shipping code that creates real impact     you'll thrive with us.

Role
As a Talent Acquisition Intern, you'll play a key role in helping us build a high-performing team by supporting the end-to-end recruitment process.

Key Responsibilities
- Assist in sourcing, screening, and interviewing candidates for various roles across the company.
- Manage job postings across portals and social platforms to attract top talent.
- Coordinate with hiring managers to schedule interviews and share timely feedback with candidates.
- Support the team in organizing recruitment events, job fairs, and other outreach activities.
- Maintain and update the applicant tracking system to ensure data accuracy and integrity.
- Conduct research on recruitment trends and best practices to optimize hiring strategies.
- Assist in writing and updating job descriptions to ensure they are inclusive and appealing.

Who Can Apply
We're looking for candidates who:
- Are available to work from our office in Vashi, Navi Mumbai.
- Can join immediately.
- Are available for a minimum of 6 months 
- Have strong communication skills, a keen interest in recruitment, and a passion for startups.

Perks
- Opportunity to work closely with a high-growth startup team.
- Learn the end-to-end hiring process in a fast-paced environment.
- Hands-on experience in building teams and talent strategy.

The ideal candidate combines creative design skills with organizational abilities and a strong understanding of social media platforms.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:


1. Manage the daily operations of social media accounts, including Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
2. Monitor performance and engagement metrics to track the effectiveness of content.

10. Edit and enhance photos for social media use and design highlight covers, profile images, and story graphics.

14. Optimize posting times to boost audience engagement and set up automated publishing when necessary.
15. Track and revise scheduled content as needed, ensuring posting frequency aligns with platform norms.

Title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Analyze Domain Authority (DA), Domain Rating (DR), Page Authority (PA), and similar SEO metrics using tools like Moz, Ahrefs, and SEMrush to assess overall domain strength 
2. Evaluate backlink profiles of the company and competitors, identifying high-quality links and opportunities for outreach
3. Flag spammy or toxic backlinks for disavowal using data from Google Search Console, SEMrush, and Ahrefs
4. Track changes in domain metrics over time, monitoring trends, anomalies, and potential impacts on SEO health
5. Benchmark against competitors, comparing domain and page metrics to gauge relative authority 
6. Segment referring domains by quality, relevance, and industry type to prioritize outreach campaigns 
7. Support backlink outreach efforts by identifying high-authority domains for partnerships and link-building campaigns 
8. Maintain regular reports on domain performance, backlink growth, and authority trends 
9. Monitor inbound and outbound link profiles to ensure a balanced and healthy link ecosystem 
10. Collaborate with the SEO team to align link-building strategies with domain authority objectives and SEO goals

Title: Social Media Marketing
Description:
Position: Social Media Intern
 Company: Clik Catalyst
 Location: Ahmedabad (Hybrid)
 Duration: 3 Months
 Stipend:    5,000/month
 Start Date: Immediate

About Clik Catalyst
At Clik Catalyst, we're not just another digital agency     we're where Creativity Meets Conversion. We help brands grow through compelling storytelling, impactful design, and strategic digital marketing. Join a team that thrives on ideas, collaboration, and pushing boundaries.

Role Overview
We are looking for a passionate and driven Social Media Intern to support our team in managing and growing brand presence across various platforms. This role is perfect for someone who lives and breathes content, trends, and digital engagement.

Responsibilities
1) Assist in planning, creating, and scheduling content across platforms like Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook
2) Support in managing the monthly content calendar
3) Draft engaging captions and copy tailored to brand tone
4) Conduct competitor and trend research to contribute fresh ideas
5) Coordinate with design and marketing teams for creatives
6) Monitor engagement and assist in community management
7) Track basic analytics and assist in performance reporting

Requirements
1) Strong interest in social media and digital marketing
2) Good written communication and creative thinking skills
3) Familiarity with platforms like Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook
4) Basic understanding of tools like Canva or willingness to learn
5) Ability to work independently and in a fast-paced environment
5) Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in marketing, media, or related field

Perks
1) Internship Certificate
2) Hands-on experience with real brands and campaigns
3) Mentorship from experienced professionals
4) Possibility of a full-time role post internship
5) Letter of recommendation for high-performing interns
6) Flexible working hours with hybrid work model

To Apply:
 Send your resume and any relevant work samples (optional) to info@clikcatalyst.com
Subject Line: Social Media Intern Application - [Your Name]

Description:
We are a growing international business with a strong presence in Korea. Our core activities include market research, business development, client engagement, and strategic partnerships. We primarily cater to Korean clients and work on expanding our market reach through professional networking, presentations, and lead generation.

We are looking for a highly motivated International business development intern to assist in expanding our business in Korea. The intern will be responsible for market research, client outreach, email communication, business presentations, and supporting business development initiatives. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience in international trade, client interaction, and strategic business growth.

1. Conduct market research on Korean industries and business trends.
2. Identify potential clients and business opportunities.
3. Draft and send business emails for introductions and follow-ups.
4. Support in creating business presentations (PPTs) and reports.
5. Assist in business grinding activities like lead generation and networking.
6. Coordinate with internal teams and Korean clients to facilitate smooth communication.
7. Support strategic business development initiatives as required.

Requirements:

1. Currently, pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's/Master's degree in Business, International Trade, Marketing, Animation and Video Editing or a related field.
2. Strong interest in international business and market expansion.
3. Exceptional communication skills in English (knowledge of Korean is a plus).
4. Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Word) and research tools.
5. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
6. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
7. Video Editing, Social Media Marketing

Benefits:

1. Hands-on experience in international business development.
2. Exposure to Korean market strategies and business culture.
3. Opportunity to work with experienced professionals in the industry.
4. Certificate of Internship upon successful completion.

Title: Purchase And Procurement
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Vendor communication & coordination: Collect daily quotations from multiple suppliers for required raw materials/feedstocks. Follow up with vendors for pending orders, delivery status, and updated price lists.
2. Data entry & record keeping: Maintain and update purchase orders (POs) in Excel/ERP/Tally. Log invoices, delivery challans, and receipts in the procurement tracker. Keep an updated supplier database with rates and terms.
3. Price comparison & analysis: Prepare daily comparative statements for management approval. Report any significant price changes or trends to the procurement manager.
4. Order processing: Assist in drafting POs as per approved quotations. Verify order details (quantity, quality specs, delivery timelines).
5. Logistics follow-up: Track shipment status with transporters and confirm estimated delivery dates. Report any delays or issues immediately to the purchase team.
6. Supplier relationship support: Answer basic vendor queries and direct complex matters to the purchase head. Help collect required vendor documents (GST, MSME, bank details).
7. Support compliance & documentation: File copies of POs, invoices, and vendor contracts systematically. Check that documents are correctly signed and authorized.
8. Daily reporting: Send daily updates to the purchase/procurement manager on: Orders placed, deliveries pending, and any issues faced with vendors
9. Learn & suggest: Keep learning about new suppliers, alternate feedstocks, or better deals. Suggest ways to optimize procurement costs or vendor terms.

Title: Full Stack Developer (Mern Stack)
Description:
We're on the lookout for highly motivated and self-driven Full Stack Developer Interns (MERN Stack) who are excited to build the future of design with Phot.AI. This isn't your typical internship   we want doers who can take ownership, figure things out, and execute with minimal supervision. As an intern at Phot.AI, you'll get hands-on experience building real-world applications from the ground up using the MERN stack. You'll work on meaningful features, contribute to the overall architecture, and collaborate closely with our design and backend teams. You'll also be encouraged to adopt AI-assisted development tools (like Cursor, Claude, GitHub Copilot, etc.) and experiment with agentic AI workflows to boost productivity and innovation. If you're someone who's passionate about coding, quick to learn, and ready to shape the future of AI-powered design, we'd love to have you on board.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Build and maintain full-stack features using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.
2. Translate UI/UX designs into responsive, pixel-perfect, and performant web interfaces.
3. Design clean, scalable, and maintainable architecture for assigned tasks or components.
4. Write clean, reusable, and efficient code     and proactively refactor when needed.
5. Collaborate with design and backend teams to ensure smooth integration and excellent user experience.
6. Leverage AI-powered development tools (Cursor, Claude, Copilot, etc.) to accelerate coding, debugging, and documentation.
7. Use agentic AI workflows to automate repetitive tasks and enhance developer efficiency.
8. Take full ownership of tasks from start to finish     with minimal hand-holding.
9. Stay curious and updated with new technologies and AI trends in software development.
10. Participate in code reviews and contribute to best practices within the team.

Why Join Us:

At Phot.AI, you will have the opportunity to work with a talented and diverse team on cutting-edge technologies that are shaping the future of photography. We offer competitive compensation packages, comprehensive benefits and a collaborative work environment where your contributions are valued and recognized. If you are passionate about frontend development and want to be part of a dynamic team that is pushing the boundaries of visual technology, we would love to hear from you.
Phot.AI is an equal-opportunity employer and values diversity in the workplace. We encourage individuals of all backgrounds to apply.

Title: Video Editing/Making
Description:
1. Assembling Footage:  Taking raw video clips and arranging them in a logical and . engaging sequence.  
2. Cutting and Trimming:  Removing unwanted footage and refining the length of individual clips.  
3. Adding Transitions and Effects:  Using software to create smooth transitions between clips and adding visual effects to enhance the video.  
4. Sound Design:  Adding and adjusting music, sound effects, and dialogue to create the desired atmosphere and clarity.  
5. Color Correction and Grading:  Adjusting the color and tone of the video to improve its visual quality and consistency.  
6. Adding Graphics and Text:  Incorporating titles, lower thirds, and other on-screen text elements.  
7. Maintaining Continuity:  Ensuring that the video flows smoothly and logically, with consistent visual and narrative elements.

Title: Data Analytics
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Search job portals, government websites, and company career pages daily to identify new vacancy advertisements.
2. Download and systematically organize PDF vacancy notices in a structured digital archive.
3. Extract key details from each PDF, including post name, location, salary, last date, advertisement number, advertisement date, age limit, required qualifications, and specialization. Use of deepseek to analyse PDF's
4. Cross-check extracted data against the original PDF to ensure accuracy and completeness.
5. Convert raw data into a structured format (Excel/Google Sheets) with standardized columns for easy analysis and feeding into website backend.
6. Categorize vacancies on basis of qualifications.
7. Flag urgent deadlines (e.g., applications closing within 7 days) for priority processing.
8. Prepare and submit a daily report summarizing processed vacancies, highlighting trends and key findings.
9. Use PDF extraction tools (Adobe Acrobat, Smallpdf) efficiently and suggest workflow improvements.
10. Collaborate with the team to refine data extraction methods and address any challenges.

Title: International Customer Service: The Coolest Weekend Internship
Description:
The coolest weekend internship is here!

Get a chance to work with one of the most iconic brands, interact with international customers, and earn a prestigious certificate and a stipend of    13,000/- that turns heads. And yes, free food, snacks, and beverages too!

All of this in a 8-day weekend internship as per the following schedule:

Onboarding & training (can be in any shift - day shift or the evening shift): 

1. 28th July /13th August (Mon - Fri, onboarding)
2. 17th August (Sun, training)
3. 24th  August (Sun, training)
4. 30th & 31st August (Sat & Sun, training)

Production i.e. actual working (night shift):

1. 7th September (Sun)
2. 14th September(Sun)
3. 21st September (Sun)

What will you do in the internship: 

1. Provide excellent customer service over the phone.
2. Adhere to program-defined quality standards.
3. Stay informed about the latest information and updates.
4. Perform tasks related to voice profiles.

Since the internship requires interacting with international clients, you must possess excellent English-speaking skills. 

You must be comfortable with either the day shift or the evening shift on the training and onboarding dates and night shifts (only) on the production dates. Also, you would need to clear the training to proceed further with the production phase.

The internship location would be in Gurgaon. Please apply to this internship ONLY if you are available on the above dates and shifts and can arrange for your own transport to the office. Other than the stipend, no cab allowance would be provided. Free food/snacks and beverages would be available during cafeteria operating hours.

Title: Business Development (Sales)
Description:
About Userhood

Userhood is a design-first product studio and learning space that works with early-stage startups to untangle messy UX, build delightful case studies, and help founders launch fast. We believe in hands-on creation, lean execution, and stories that move both users and businesses.

We're looking for a Business Development Intern to help us scale our outreach and lead generation.

Research and identify potential leads (startups, product teams, creators, founders)
Build, manage, and maintain lead databases using tools like Google Sheets, Notion, or Airtable
Write and send personalized cold emails and messages
Track open rates, replies, and funnel performance
Use tools like Mail Merge, Apollo, Hunter, etc., to streamline outreach
Report weekly progress with metrics and insights
Collaborate on growth campaigns and testing strategies
Support warm lead handoff and follow-ups

Skills Required

Strong research and data-finding skills (LinkedIn, Crunchbase, Twitter, directories)
Excellent written communication, especially for crafting concise, personal outreach messages
Highly organized and able to manage multiple outreach pipelines
Familiarity with spreadsheets, Notion, and basic lead gen tools
Self-starter mindset with the ability to work independently and iterate fast
Bonus: familiarity with startups, product design, or the UX/UI ecosystem

Title: AWS DevOps Engineer
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 
1.CI/CD Pipeline Support: Assist in designing, implementing, and maintaining continuous integration and deployment pipelines to streamline the software delivery process.
2. Infrastructure Automation: Learn and support the development of Infrastructure as Code(IaC) using tools like Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible.
3. Cloud Infrastructure: Support the deployment and management of cloud-based resources on platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud under guidance.
4. Monitoring & Logging: Assist in setting up and maintaining monitoring, logging, and alerting systems using tools like Prometheus, Grafana, ELK Stack, or Splunk.
5. Configuration Management: Gain exposure to tools like Ansible, Chef, or Puppet to manage system configurations and ensure environment consistency.
6. Containerization & Orchestration: Learn to build and manage Docker containers and understand container orchestration using Kubernetes or similar platforms.
7. Collaboration & Troubleshooting: Work closely with cross-functional teams to understand system requirements, resolve issues, and ensure high system availability.
8. Version Control: Use Git for source code management and learn standard Git workflows as part of the development lifecycle.

Required Skills and Qualifications:

1. Bachelor's degree (or pursuing final year) in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related discipline.
2. Basic understanding of DevOps principles and cloud technologies.
3. Exposure to at least one scripting or programming language (e.g., Python, Bash).
4. Familiarity with Linux/Unix environments.
5. Understanding of version control systems like Git.
6. Eagerness to learn tools like Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
7. Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to work in a collaborative environment

Title: Marketing Ops/Automation Intern
Description:
We're looking for a marketing automation intern who's excited to build the foundation of our demand-generation engine. You'll help us set up, streamline, and automate our lead management and email nurturing workflows using tools like Webflow, Hubspot, Mailchimp, and Airtable. This is a hands-on role for someone who's curious, self-driven, and excited to blend marketing with systems thinking.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

A. Marketing stack setup & management:
1. Set up and maintain a lean marketing tech stack (Webflow, Hubspot, Mailchimp, Airtable).
2. Ensure tools are integrated and data flows seamlessly across platforms.

B. Lead capture infrastructure:
1. Build and embed a lead capture form on www.enout.in for gated content or lead magnets.
2. Ensure responses are auto-logged and visible to the sales/demand-gen team.

C. CRM & lead tracking:
1. Create and maintain a central Airtable/Hubspot base to track leads, traffic sources, and follow-up status.
2. Update lead stages (cold     MQL     SQL) and ensure follow-ups are visible and actionable.

D. Email campaign automation:
1. Set up a Mailchimp account from scratch.
2. Design and schedule an automated email drip campaign tailored to different user segments.

E. Internal alerts & notifications: Configure workflows or Slack/email alerts to notify the demand-gen team when leads open, click, or engage with emails.

F. Analytics & reporting
1. Build a bi-weekly dashboard/report covering key funnel metrics like form fills, Email open/click rates, and Qualified lead conversions (MQL     SQL).
2. Suggest optimizations based on performance insights.

What you'll gain:

1. Direct mentorship from experienced marketers and operators.
2. Real-world exposure to marketing systems and growth frameworks.
3. Opportunity to own meaningful projects that impact lead pipelines.
4. A standout portfolio piece for a future career in b2b marketing or martech.

Title: Fundraising And Partnerships
Description:
VAYAM is a not-for-profit organization that transforms grassroots realities into data-driven, tech-enabled solutions across health, livelihoods, education, and social inclusion. As the community arm of Sambodhi   India's largest data-driven social impact organization   VAYAM leverages over 20 years of sectoral expertise to design scalable, evidence-based interventions. Rooted in equity, collaboration, and capacity building, its mission is to empower communities through inclusive, community-led solutions. VAYAM envisions a future where vulnerable populations become self-reliant, equitable, and resilient, creating a lasting impact across generations. Adopting a community-first approach, the organization harnesses real-time data and AI innovation to tailor and scale its initiatives. One such initiative is its AI chatbot program, designed to equip over 100,000 learners with foundational digital and AI literacy, soft skills for employability, and gamified, certificate-based learning experiences.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

9. Support the integration of digital tools in programme delivery and monitoring.

The above essential functions are representative of the major duties of positions in this job. Specific duties and responsibilities may vary. Other duties may be assigned similar to the above, consistent with the knowledge, skills, and abilities required for the job.

Title: Accounting & Tally
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 


1. Bookkeeping: Maintain and update financial records and ledgers in Tally. Record all daily transactions, including sales, purchases, receipts, and payments, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
2. Financial reporting: Prepare and present monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements. Generate and analyze reports on financial performance, including income statements and balance sheets.
3. Reconciliation: Perform bank reconciliations and ensure the accuracy of cash flow management. Reconcile accounts payable and receivable to maintain accurate records.
4. Compliance: Ensure compliance with relevant accounting standards, regulations, and internal policies. Assist in the preparation and execution of audits by providing necessary documentation and support.
5. Tax management: Prepare and file tax returns, ensuring timely and accurate submission of tax-related documentation. Stay updated on tax regulations and assist in tax planning to optimize liabilities.
6. Support and collaboration: Assist management in budgeting and forecasting processes. Collaborate with other departments to provide financial insights and support decision-making.

Title: Full Stack Development
Description:
At Innovon Technologies, we are a reputable technology consulting firm with a global reach. We specialize in providing high-quality services that deliver impactful results to our clients. Our mission is to empower businesses to achieve more by leveraging the latest technological advancements and best practices in their industries.

We are seeking a highly motivated and talented fresher intern to join our team and gain hands-on experience in the field of Full Stack Development, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLM), and related technologies. The intern will work closely with our experienced team members and assist in various training and certification activities.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop and maintain user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and front-end frameworks like React.
2. Ensure responsive design for different devices and browsers.
3. Implement UI/UX designs, focusing on user experience and accessibility.
4. Design and build server-side logic, APIs, and databases.
5. Design, manage, and optimize databases using SQL (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) or NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB) databases.
6. Learn and understand the fundamentals of AI, ML, NLP, and related technologies.
7. Assist in the development and implementation of AI and ML models.
8. Conduct research on state-of-the-art AI, ML, LLM, and NLP techniques.
9. Participate in the training and validation of ML models using appropriate tools and frameworks.
10. Assist in creating documentation and reports for the training and certification process.
11. Stay updated with the latest advancements and trends in AI, ML, NLP, LLM, and related fields.

Benefits:

1. Hands-on experience in cutting-edge Full Stack Development, AI, ML, LLM, and NLP technologies.
2. Exposure to real-world projects and industry practices.
3. Opportunity to work with experienced professionals and expand your professional network.
4. Mentorship and guidance throughout the internship period.
5. Possibility of future employment based on performance and availability of positions.

Work Environment: We believe in fostering a positive and inclusive work environment that encourages Innovon, growth, and collaboration

Company Culture:

1. Diversity and Inclusion: Innovon Tech promotes a culture of diversity and inclusion recognizing the value of different perspectives, backgrounds, and experiences. We aim to create an inclusive work environment where all employees feel respected, valued and empowered.
2. Innovation and Continuous improvement: Innovation Tech values innovation and encourages employees to think creatively, embrace change, and identify opportunities for improvement.
3. Work-life balance: Innovation Tech recognizes the importance of work-life balance and promotes employee well- being. Offer flexible work arrangements. Wellness programs, and resources to help employees manage their personal and professional life effectively.
4. Core values: Innovon Tech Judiciously follows "Respect, inclusivity, Trust, Integrity, Accountability, Passion, Proactivity" as core values of the company.
