Title: Social Media Marketing
Description:
Social Media Intern - Day-to-Day at Our (Remote) Studio:

As a Social Media Intern, you won't just be "posting content." You'll work closely with the founder to support premium-to-luxury lifestyle brands in  building intentional, design-led digital narratives. Your day-to-day will be a blend of  creative thinking, structured execution, and deep storytelling.

Here's what a typical day or week might look like:

1. Research & Insights
     Conduct competitive audits and trend research
     Gather visual and copy inspiration aligned with each client's positioning
     Identify content gaps, cultural moments, or opportunities for creative hooks
     Content Planning & Copywriting
     Assist in building content calendars (brand storytelling, product highlights, campaign drops)
     Draft captions that reflect brand voice     from playful to polished
     Organize storyboards and carousel breakdowns for feed posts and reels

2. Platform Management & Posting
     Schedule posts on Instagram and LinkedIn via Notion/Later/Meta
     Monitor content performance and gather basic insights for internal debriefs
     Engage with the brand community (DMs, comments) when required

Brainstorming & Ideation
     Join weekly creative check-ins with the founder to pitch post ideas and campaign concepts
     Stay sharp with cultural conversations, Gen Z trends, and algorithmic shifts
     Help script reels and write punchy one-liners when creativity strikes

Who You'll Work With: You'll be working directly with the  founder      a strategist and creative director     gaining hands-on exposure to content strategy, storytelling, and how brands evolve in the real world. You'll also get a peek behind the curtain: how pitches are made, how feedback is managed, and how creativity translates into business value.

What We're Looking For Someone who is:

     Curious and loves the internet
     Obsessed with aesthetics and storytelling
     Not afraid to write, suggest ideas, or ask questions
     Comfortable juggling multiple brands and tones of voice
     Organized, deadline-driven, and collaborative

Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

3. Plan and execute fundraising campaigns through digital marketing and direct outreach
4. Develop creative outreach strategies to attract new donors and retain existing supporters

Why join Pawzz?

1. Make an impact: Contribute directly to animal welfare by ensuring a steady flow of resources for medical aid, shelter, and rescue operations

Description:
Join our team as a 'Public Relations Intern' and play a pivotal role in raising funds, boosting engagement, and creating mass impact through effective communication strategies. This internship opportunity focuses on leveraging your communication skills, creativity, and passion for social impact to support our organization's mission. By dedicating just 20-30 minutes a day to this internship, you can get an attractive certificate, a letter of recommendation, and a stipend for yourself. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Provide fundraising support: Assist in developing and implementing fundraising strategies and campaigns aimed at engaging donors and supporters.
2. Create compelling content for fundraising appeals, donor communications, and sponsorship materials.
3. Work on engagement initiatives: Support the planning and execution of engagement initiatives to foster relationships with donors, volunteers, and the community. Assist in organizing events, fundraisers, and outreach activities to increase awareness and support for our organization's mission.
4. Work on media relations and content marketing: Cultivate relationships with media outlets, and influencers to secure coverage and publicity for our initiatives and events. 
5. Work on sales and partnerships: Participate in sales activities to generate donations and sponsorships for our programs. Explore partnership opportunities with businesses, institutions, and community groups to support our fundraising goals.

Note: This internship is brought to you by the Pawzz Foundation. Your work on this platform may overlap with some common work elements.

Sales is not just about transactions   it's about creating meaningful connections and driving impactful change. In this role, you will develop strategic outreach plans, engage with potential donors, and contribute to revenue generation through online fundraising campaigns. This is a unique opportunity to refine your sales and persuasion skills while working for a cause that truly matters.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop and implement outreach strategies to attract potential donors.
2. Promote online fundraising campaigns and drive contributions.
3. Build and maintain relationships with supporters to maximize engagement.
4. Utilize digital platforms, emails, and calls to enhance donor outreach.
5. Analyze campaign performance and optimize approaches for better results.

What You Gain:

1. Hands-on experience in sales-driven fundraising and outreach.
2. Certificate & letter of recommendation to enhance your resume.
3. Stipend upon achieving milestones.
4. The opportunity to develop in-demand sales skills while making a difference.

This internship offers you an exciting opportunity to engage in sales, outreach, and donor relations to support the mission of our NGO. If you have a passion for making a difference and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment, this internship is for you!

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Sales & Donor Acquisition: Identify and reach out to potential donors, presenting the organization's mission in a compelling manner. Use effective communication and persuasion skills to convert leads into long-term donors or partners.

Leverage personal networks, contacts, and referrals to spread awareness and attract new donors or partners. Act as a liaison between the NGO and potential donors, ensuring clear communication and relationship-building.

5. Donor Engagement & Retention: Manage relationships with current donors, ensuring ongoing engagement and retention.
6. Data Analysis & Reporting: Track and report on donor acquisition and fundraising efforts. Analyze campaign performance, donor behavior, and sales metrics to suggest improvements for future campaigns.

Title: Video Editing/Making
Description:
Stimuler is one of the fastest-growing AI startups in India- We have over 5M+ global users, 80% of its revenue outside India, and has raised over USD 3.5M from the world's biggest investors. Team-wise, we keep a super-lean culture and the total team size is less than 10. 

We are looking for a talented and highly efficient Video Editor to produce high-quality, engaging content at speed, primarily for our Instagram Reels. 

If you have been a high-achiever (top 1%) in any field like sports/arts/academics/work - that's always a bonus when it comes to getting an interview. We are growing over 30% every month, so you should also be ready to learn fast and grow with us.

The ideal candidate is a master of short-form video, capable of turning around multiple edits per day without sacrificing an ounce of quality. You will be a crucial part of our marketing engine, creating fast-paced, captivating content that drives our brand's growth and engagement on social media.

Your day to day responsibilities would include:

1. High-Volume Reel Production:  Consistently edit and deliver 2-3 high-quality Instagram Reels per day. This is a full-time role, and this output is expected to take approximately 7-8 hours of your daily focus.
2. Efficient Editing:  Transform raw footage and content from external agencies into polished, compelling short-form videos optimized for social media platforms.
3. AI-Enhanced Workflow:  Leverage modern AI-powered video editing tools to accelerate and enhance your workflow, from transcription and captioning to clip selection and automated edits.
4. Brand Consistency:  Ensure every video strictly adheres to Stimuler's brand guidelines and marketing objectives, with a relentless focus on rapid, high-quality delivery.
5. Trend Integration:  Stay ahead of the latest trends, sounds, and techniques in short-form video to ensure our content is always fresh, relevant, and engaging.

You can take a look at this video for an understanding of the quality of videos that is expected: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xvLCUCOb91sTMepYNxSftWSKHqKFlJhU/view?usp=sharing

What we're looking for:

1. Excellent Video Editing Skills:  Proven ability to edit videos with outstanding proficiency, a strong sense of pacing, and compelling visual storytelling, all while operating at high speed.
2. Software Proficiency:  Hands-on expertise with industry-standard video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
3. Adeptness with AI Tools:  Demonstrable experience using AI tools within your video editing workflow to boost efficiency and creativity.
4. Strong Portfolio:  A robust portfolio is required, showcasing your best video editing work with a specific emphasis on Instagram Reels or other short-form social media videos that demonstrate speed and quality.
5. Speed and High-Volume Output:  A track record of working quickly and managing a demanding workload in a fast-paced environment, with the ability to consistently produce 2-3 polished videos daily.
6. Meticulous Attention to Detail:  A keen eye for detail to ensure all edits are clean, professional, and perfectly aligned with the creative brief.

You'll work closely with the marketing team to ideate, execute, and analyze digital content, and you'll leave this internship with a solid portfolio of work, mentorship, and professional experience. And who knowns you may also get a full-time employment opportunity with us.

3. Strong writing, editing, and communication skills.
4. Ability to analyze data and make data-driven decisions.
5. Creative mindset with an eye for design and trends.

Why Join Us? 
Interning at a startup isn't just about adding a name to your resume   it's about gaining real experience, growing fast, and making a difference from day one. Here's what makes working with a startup like:
1. A supportive and innovative team culture
2. Opportunities for professional growth and training
3. Flexible work environment and competitive compensation.
4. Real Work, Real Impact
5. Mentorship & Close Collaboration
6. Exposure to the Full Development Cycle.

What We're Looking For?
We're looking for a creative, self-driven intern who is passionate about content creation and digital storytelling. Someone who's always up to date with trends, loves creating reels, and knows how to engage an online audience.
We're looking for someone who is:
1. Organized and Reliable
2. Creative and Visual
3. Strong in Communication and Writing
4. Socially Aware and Trend-Savvy
5. Curious and Willing to Learn
6. Organized and reliable

 2. Monitor performance metrics and optimize campaigns for growth.

Title: Telecaller
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Conduct cold calls to potential leads and explain products/services clearly.
2. Qualify leads based on specific criteria and pass quality leads to the sales team.
3. Work on data churning to clean, update, and segment candidate databases.
4. Use CRM tools to manage, track, and update lead status and call records.
5. Follow up on warm leads through calls or emails.
6. Maintain accurate records of calls and lead interactions.
7. Share daily/weekly reports on lead status and calling performance.

Title: Psychology
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1.     Conducting research within the designated community, based on selected roles, which encompass:
        Awareness Advocates: Spreading awareness about mental health and mental well-being within communities
        Community Surveys: Assisting in understanding the community's needs by conducting surveys and interviews
        Support Groups: Participating in and facilitating support groups within communities
        Therapy Workshops and Sessions: Involvement in therapy workshops and sessions with trained professionals (limited to master's students and above)
2.    Engaging in similar sessions organized online for volunteers
3.    Contributing to online tasks, which involve assisting the team in creating content, designing schedules for awareness workshops and support sessions, and designing surveys

Title: Video Editing & Digital Marketing
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Create short-form content (Reels, Shorts) aligned with trending formats
2. Edit videos with high-retention intros, punchy cuts, subtitles, emojis, and memes
3. Repurpose long-form podcasts, interviews, or webinars into snackable clips
4. Use tools like CapCut, Premiere Pro, Canva, or Final Cut Pro.
5. You understand content hooks, virality, and storytelling.
6. Assist in content planning, calendar management, and idea brainstorming
7. Run & optimize organic and paid campaigns (Instagram, YouTube, Google)
8. Leverage AI tools (like ChatGPT, Notion AI) to speed up copywriting and research
9. Analyze insights & engagement metrics to double down on what's working
10. Collaborate on growth experiments (e.g., trending sound hacks, A/B hooks, UGC)

Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Research and identify potential leads through various channels, including online research, social media, and networking events
 2. Develop and maintain a database of leads and prospects for future reference

Title: Social Media Marketing
Description:
Are you a social media savvy individual with a passion for marketing and client relations? WI THINKERS is looking for a talented Social Media Marketing intern to join our dynamic team! As an English proficient candidate, you will have the opportunity to collaborate with our clients and create engaging content that drives brand awareness and customer engagement. 

Key responsibilities include:
1. Developing and implementing social media strategies to enhance brand presence.
2. Creating and curating content for various platforms, including Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.
3. Engaging with followers and responding to comments and messages in a timely manner.
4. Conducting market research and staying up-to-date on industry trends.
5. Assisting with client communication and building strong relationships.
6. Analyzing social media metrics to track performance and optimize campaigns.
7. Collaborating with the marketing team on special projects and campaigns.

If you are a creative thinker with excellent communication skills and a strong attention to detail, we want to hear from you! Join us at WI THINKERS and take your social media marketing skills to the next level. Apply now!

Title: Performance Marketer (Fashion D2C)
Description:
As a performance marketer intern at Laxmi Traders, you'll have the opportunity to dive into the exciting world of fashion direct-to-consumer marketing. With a focus on Facebook Ads, Google AdWords, SEO, Instagram Ads, Instagram marketing, marketing automation, and marketing campaigns, you'll play a key role in driving growth for our brand. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Create and optimize Facebook ad campaigns to drive traffic and conversions
2. Manage Google AdWords campaigns to increase brand visibility and drive sales
3. Implement SEO strategies to improve organic search rankings and website traffic
4. Develop and execute Instagram ad campaigns to engage with our target audience
5. Utilize marketing automation tools to streamline processes and improve efficiency
6. Plan and execute marketing campaigns to promote new products and drive sales
7. Monitor and analyze key performance metrics to continually improve marketing efforts and achieve business goals.

If you're a creative and analytical individual with a passion for fashion marketing, we'd love to have you join our team and help us take our brand to the next level! Apply now and be a part of our exciting journey.

Title: Sales Development Representative (SDR)/Growth Marketing
Description:
Are you looking to jumpstart your career in sales or marketing at a fast-paced, innovation-driven SaaS company? Join Corizance Labs India Pvt Ltd, where we're building next-gen business risk intelligence solutions. As a Sales Development Representative (SDR) or Growth Marketing Intern, you will be an integral part of our sales and marketing engine   helping us grow faster, smarter, and more customer-focused.You'll work directly with our experienced team to identify new opportunities, engage prospects, run marketing campaigns, and build relationships that drive revenue and brand trust. This is more than just an internship   it's a chance to grow with a company that's redefining the way businesses use technology to mitigate risk.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Market intelligence: Conduct market research to identify target segments, ideal customer profiles, and industry trends.
2. Growth strategy: Design, test, and scale sales and marketing initiatives that drive qualified pipeline growth.
3. Lead generation: Use tools like LinkedIn, email, and other digital channels to identify, engage, and qualify prospects.
4. Social media & content: Support marketing campaigns across social platforms and assist in creating high-impact, brand-building content.
5. Client engagement: Qualify leads, understand client pain points, and present tailored solutions aligned with their needs.
6. Sales enablement: Support the creation of outreach strategies, pitch decks, email templates, and demo scripts.
7. Relationship building: Nurture long-term client relationships through timely follow-ups and personalized outreach.
8. Team collaboration: Coordinate with sales, marketing, and product teams to ensure aligned messaging and client experience.
9. Performance tracking: Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and suggest process improvements based on insights.

Title: Founders Office
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Conduct market research.
2. Manage communications with stakeholders.
3.  Assist the founder with strategic & operational support.

Title: Video Editing
Description:
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with the creative and strategy teams to develop compelling video concepts and storyboards that effectively communicate our political messaging.
Edit raw footage into high-quality, engaging videos that align with brand guidelines and resonate with our target audience.
Enhance video content using motion graphics, visual effects, transitions, and sound design to elevate production quality.
Stay current with video editing trends, tools, and techniques, bringing fresh and innovative ideas to each project.
Manage multiple video projects simultaneously while maintaining high standards and meeting tight deadlines.
Actively contribute ideas and feedback to improve video content, production workflows, and overall creative impact.
Maintain a well-organized file and asset management system to ensure easy access and proper archival of all video content.

Requirements:
Proficiency in  Adobe Premiere Pro  and  Adobe After Effects
Working knowledge of  Final Cut Pro  (optional but preferred)
Strong understanding of video editing principles, pacing, and storytelling
Experience with  motion graphics  and basic  sound design
Ability to work independently and within a team in a fast-paced environment
Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work
Familiarity with organizing and managing media assets efficiently

Title: CA Articleship
Description:
Alvino Consultancy LLP offers a dynamic opportunity for articled assistants to continuously learn. The firm aims to provide good all-round exposure to its team, ensuring that learning experiences cover certain segments of practice akin to a traditional CA environment. The areas of practice cover all segments including DT, IDT, TP, FEMA, labour law compliances, audits, and company law matters. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Work on assignments related to direct tax (DT) including tax audits, return filings, and assessments.
2. Assist in handling indirect tax (IDT) matters such as GST filings, reconciliations, and audits.
3. Support the team in transfer pricing (TP) documentation and compliance work.
4. Assist with FEMA-related compliance and reporting.
5. Handle labor law compliances including PF, ESIC, and other statutory filings.
6. Participate in statutory audits, internal audits, and tax audits across industries.
7. Work on company law matters such as ROC filings, incorporation, and maintenance of statutory records.
8. Prepare and maintain proper documentation and reports for assigned tasks.
9. Coordinate with clients for data collection and query resolution.

Candidate requirements: 

1. Must be eager to learn. 
2. Should be hard-working and sincere. 
3. Should have a zeal for continuous personal development and learning.

Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Collaborate with the creative team to develop concepts and storyboards for motion graphics projects
2. Design motion graphics for a wide range of purposes, including promotional videos, social media content, presentations, and advertisements
3. Have knowledge of software such as Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, and Illustrator to produce high-quality animations and visual effects
4. Keep abreast of industry trends and best practices in motion graphics design and animation

Title: Graphic Design
Description:
As a graphic design intern at Gharpayy, you will have the opportunity to work with a dynamic and innovative team to create visually stunning designs that will captivate our audience. We are looking for a talented individual who is proficient in Adobe Photoshop, CorelDRAW, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Premiere Pro, and UI & UX design to help bring our brand to life.

2. Design eye-catching graphics for print materials such as brochures, flyers, and business cards.
3. Assist in creating engaging video content for product demonstrations and promotional videos using Adobe Premiere Pro.

5. Keep up to date with the latest design trends and technologies to ensure our brand remains fresh and relevant.
6. Provide support for ad hoc design projects as needed, demonstrating flexibility and creativity in your approach.
7. Contribute ideas and concepts to help drive the overall creative vision of the company forward.

If you are a passionate and driven individual with a keen eye for design, this internship opportunity at Gharpayy is perfect for you. Join us in shaping the future of our brand through your creative talents. Apply now and let your creativity shine!

Description:

2. Help with onboarding new employees by preparing and organizing necessary paperwork.

If you are a motivated and eager learner looking to kickstart your career in HR, this internship is the perfect opportunity for you to grow and develop your skills in a fast-paced and creative environment. Apply now and be a part of our exciting team at APSK Production & Entertainment Private Limited.

Title: Digital Awareness – Unlimited AI Stock - PixAIbay
Description:
PixAIbay is the new in-house product of I Educate Myself Daily Foundation. PixAIbay is your ultimate destination for discovering, sharing, and downloading stunning AI-generated images. Explore a vast collection of creative visuals, from digital art to photo-realistic scenes. Ideal for designers, marketers, and creators seeking inspiration. Browse by category, save favorites, and fuel your imagination with PixAIbay - where AI meets visual inspiration.

1. Promote the platform: Actively spread awareness about PixAIbay among creative communities.

Title: Sales & Marketing - Software Products In Cybersecurity
Description:
Are you a driven and creative individual with a passion for sales and marketing? AvinyaSQ Technologies is seeking a talented Sales and Marketing intern to join our dynamic team. This is an exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience in lead generation, marketing strategy, campaigns, digital marketing, market research, and content marketing. 


Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:


A. Sales outreach & lead generation
1. Research and identify qualified B2B prospects across key target sectors 
2. Support personalized outreach via email, LinkedIn, and CRM workflows
3. Assist in meeting scheduling, follow-ups, and pipeline updates
4. Track lead progress and engagement metrics through CRM tools

B. Marketing campaigns, events & GTM support
1. Contribute to campaign planning and execution across LinkedIn, email, and niche cybersecurity platforms
2. Support promotional efforts for webinars, virtual roundtables, and product briefings
3. Assist in Go-to-Market (GTM) activities, such as creating launch content, sales enablement material, and messaging frameworks
4. Track campaign KPIs (open rates, click-throughs, registrations) and recommend improvements

C. Demand generation
1. Help design and implement demand gen activities, including content funnels, lead magnets (e.g., self-assessments, templates), and newsletter workflows
2. Collaborate with the team to identify Ideal Customer Profiles (ICPs) and key buyer personas
3. Use competitor and industry data to help refine targeting strategies and segmentation

D. Market research & industry intelligence
1. Track trends in post-quantum cryptography, data protection, and cybersecurity policies
2. Monitor competitors' positioning, product messaging, and customer engagement tactics
3. Identify thought leadership themes and whitespace opportunities for AvinyaSQ to lead

E. Content creation & digital presence
1. Draft or co-create LinkedIn posts, email campaigns, blogs, case studies, and whitepapers
2. Develop messaging that speaks to enterprise buyers in a strategic yet simple tone
3. Support the content calendar and coordinate posting/promotion plans

F. CRM & sales enablement
1. Maintain CRM hygiene with updated records, contact notes, and lead stages
2. Assist in creating decks, proposals, and briefing documents for CXO-level meetings
3. Collaborate with sales and tech teams to shape proposals and positioning


If you are a proactive self-starter with excellent communication skills and a strong interest in sales and marketing, we want to hear from you! Join us at AvinyaSQ Technologies and kickstart your career in the exciting world of tech marketing. Apply now!

At 7 Seers Media, we believe in building tools that work at scale. That means clean architecture, real API integrations, scalable dashboards, and UI that feels effortless. We're looking for someone who's not just good at writing code     but who also understands why structure, consistency, and performance matter. If you enjoy solving complex problems, adapting quickly to new tools, and taking ownership of your work, this opportunity is built for you.

4. Develop internal dashboards for app control, analytics, or admin management

What We're Looking For

1. Strong knowledge of Flutter or React Native
2. Comfort with backend integration using Firebase, REST APIs, or Node.js
3. Understanding of state management, version control (Git), and responsive layout
4. Ability to build or maintain admin dashboards (React, Firebase, or similar stack)
5. Curiosity to learn, test, improve, and adapt fast
6. A portfolio, GitHub repo, or past project that shows your actual work is a huge plus

Title: Auditing & Accounting
Company: RJS & CO, CA (Ramesh J Somani And Company)
Description:
Are you a finance enthusiast looking to kickstart your career in accounting and auditing? Look no further! Join RJS and Co, CA (Ramesh J Somani and Company) as a finance, accounting, and auditing intern. This is a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in taxation, financial reporting, GST, auditing, banking, MS Excel, and MS Word.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

If you are a proactive and detail-oriented individual with a passion for finance, we want to hear from you! Apply now and take the first step toward a successful career in finance and accounting.

Title: Canva Editing And Book Design
Description:
Are you a  Canva expert with a good eye for aesthetics, design and detail? We're seeking a talented and responsible  freelance Canva editor to help us put the finishing touches on an inspiring guided journal. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone who loves design and wants to contribute to a project focused on personal growth. We are creating a guided journal that's designed to help individuals  unlock their potential! Think of it as a unique blend of manifestation and therapeutic self-discovery, packed with prompts to support personal growth journeys and deep self-reflection. The core design is largely complete, and we need your skilled eye to ensure it's perfectly polished and professionally presented for our audience.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Implementing  minor text edits, updates, and corrections  within existing Canva designs.
2. Adjusting  formatting, spacing, and alignment  to guarantee visual consistency throughout the entire journal.
3. Seamlessly  replacing or updating images and graphics  to maintain the journal's cohesive aesthetic.
4. Thoroughly  proofreading for any design inconsistencies or errors, ensuring a flawless final product.
5. Collaborating effectively with our team to understand and execute specific revision requests.


Requirements to qualify:

1. Proven expertise in using Canva  for design and good editing skills
2. A  strong attention to detail
3. Aesthetic eye and taste
4. Follow existing design guidelines  and maintain brand -consistency.
5. Excellent communication skills  and a commitment to responsiveness.
6. Reliable internet access and your own active Canva account.
7. Experience with journal, planner, or book design is a plus, but not a strict requirement.

Title: Business Systems & Process Architect
Description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and proactive individual to design, implement, and continuously improve business systems, SOPs, and processes across the organization. The ideal candidate will be highly skilled in ClickUp and other workflow tools, and will play a key role in building scalable systems such as CRMs, application tracking systems, project management templates, and more.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design, document, and implement standard operating procedures (SOPs) for various business functions.
2. Build and maintain scalable systems and workflows in ClickUp, including lists, templates, automations, and dashboards.
3. Develop and optimize processes for project management, CRM, application tracking, onboarding, and other core business operations.
4. Collaborate with department heads to understand requirements and translate them into efficient, user-friendly systems.
5. Train team members on new processes, templates, and tools; create user guides and training materials.
6. Monitor system usage and process adherence; identify bottlenecks and areas for improvement.
7. Continuously review and update SOPs and workflows to ensure they remain relevant and effective.
8. Integrate ClickUp with other business tools as needed (e.g., Slack, Google Workspace, CRM platforms).
9. Analyze data and generate reports to support process improvement initiatives.
10. Stay updated on ClickUp features and best practices; recommend and implement new functionalities.

Requirements:

1. Proven experience in process design, business systems, or operations management.
2. Advanced proficiency in ClickUp (lists, templates, automations, dashboards, integrations).
3. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
4. Excellent documentation and communication abilities.
5. Experience with CRM, ATS, or project management systems is a plus.
6. Ability to train and support team members on new systems and processes.
7. Detail-oriented, organized, and proactive in identifying and solving process issues.

4. Launch zPass APIs that let partner protocols query wallet scores, badge attestations, and campaign eligibility with verifiable proofs.

6. Aggregate multi-wallet behavior and unify onchain activity into a single, portable reputation profile secured by cryptographic proofs.
7. Contribute to research & dev that improves the accuracy, fairness, and robustness of Zeru's behavior-centric reputation system.

Title: AI Engineer Intern
Description:
Join our founding team as an AI Engineer Intern and gain hands-on experience at the forefront of LLM development. You'll work directly with founders and senior AI engineers to learn fine-tuning, evaluation, and optimization of large language models. This is an exceptional opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge AI research while learning from industry experts in a fast-paced startup environment.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Work closely with the founding team on real AI model development projects
2. Assist in fine-tuning LLMs under guidance from senior engineers
3. Support model evaluation and benchmarking efforts across different architectures
4. Learn advanced optimization techniques like LoRA, QLoRA, and parameter-efficient methods
5. Gain exposure to RLHF workflows and human preference learning
6. Participate in training pipeline development and understand the full model lifecycle
7. Contribute to research experiments and help implement cutting-edge techniques
8. Support the creation of new AI solutions that solve real-world problems
9. Present findings and participate in technical discussions with the team

What We're Looking For

1. Currently pursuing Bachelor's or Master's degree from IIT, NIT, BITS, or equivalent in Computer Science, AI/ML, or related field
2. Strong computer science fundamentals including algorithms, data structures, and mathematics
3. Solid foundation in linear algebra, statistics, and optimization
4. Final year undergrad or recent graduate preferred
5. Strong Python programming skills with experience in machine learning libraries
6. Academic or project experience with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow)
7. Understanding of neural network architectures and training processes
8. Familiarity with Transformers and attention mechanisms (through coursework or projects)
9. Basic knowledge of LLMs and their applications
10. Experience with Jupyter notebooks and experimental workflows
11. Personal projects involving fine-tuning or working with pre-trained models
12. Research experience or publications in AI/ML (even if academic)
13. Participation in ML competitions (Kaggle, hackathons, etc.)
14. Open-source contributions to AI/ML projects
15. Any exposure to LoRA, QLoRA, or RLHF concepts (even theoretical)
16. Internship experience at AI/ML companies or research labs

What you will gain:

1. Direct mentorship from founding team and senior AI engineers
2. Weekly research discussions and paper reading sessions
3. Hands-on experience with state-of-the-art models and techniques
4. Access to high-end GPUs and computational resources
5. Opportunity to co-author research papers or technical blogs
6. Production-level experience with LLM fine-tuning and optimization
7. Deep understanding of modern AI architectures and training techniques
8. Hands-on experience with RLHF and advanced model alignment methods
9. Research skills in evaluating and benchmarking AI models

Ready to Shape the Future of AI?
If you're passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and want to learn from industry experts while working on models that will impact millions, we want to hear from you. This internship offers unparalleled exposure to cutting-edge AI research in a high-growth startup environment.

Title: Human Resources (HR)
Description:
We are seeking a dynamic and proactive candidate to join our HR Operations team, with a strong focus on employee engagement and enhancing employee experience. This role is ideal for someone passionate about people practices, culture-building, and driving meaningful employee initiatives. The incumbent will work closely with the HR team and business stakeholders to design, implement, and evaluate programs that strengthen engagement, inclusion, and employee satisfaction. This position requires a strong foundation in HR principles, analytical skills, and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

 Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in the design and execution of employee engagement initiatives (e.g., town halls, celebrations, wellness programs, employee recognition).
2. Support employee lifecycle touchpoints (onboarding, confirmations, milestone) to ensure a positive and consistent experience.
3. Analyze periodic feedback surveys (e.g., Peakon, pulse surveys) and help derive insights and action plans.
4. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to promote a culture of belonging, openness, and performance.
5. Support the day-to-day HR operations including documentation, records management, HRIS updates, and compliance tracking.
6. Contribute to onboarding and induction programs to help new joiners assimilate into the organization.
7. Assist in maintaining employee data accuracy and generating reports for internal analysis.
8. Help streamline and improve existing HR processes to enhance efficiency and service delivery.
9. Support HRBPs and regional leaders with employee floor PULSE and recommendations for HR strategy and decision-making.
10. Draft internal communications related to HR programs, policies, and events.
11. Assist in employer branding and employee advocacy initiatives on social and internal platforms.
12. Support employee relations activities, including investigations, conflict resolution, and policy interpretation for regional employees.
13. Ensure compliance with regional and local labor laws, regulations, and company policies.
14. Provide guidance and support to managers and employees on HR-related inquiries and issues.

What do we offer?

1. Open culture and challenging opportunity to satisfy intellectual needs
2. Flexible working hours
3. Work-life balance
4. Excellent, dynamic and multicultural environment

Title: AI Agent Development
Description:
1. Agent Development & Automation Design
Build and configure automation workflows using the n8n framework.
Develop intelligent agents capable of automating tasks across various systems and APIs.
Work with team members to design agents that meet specific business requirements.
2. Agent Deployment & Integration
Deploy and manage agents on the server or cloud environment (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud).
Integrate agents with third-party services, APIs, and databases using n8n's node-based approach.
Assist in configuring and maintaining connections to external services (like Slack, Google Sheets, or CRM systems).
3. Testing and Quality Assurance
Test agent workflows and automations to ensure they are functioning as expected.
Monitor agents for performance issues and troubleshoot bugs or errors.
Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) for deployed agents to ensure they meet business needs.
4. Documentation & Reporting
Maintain documentation for the workflows, agents, and automation processes.
Provide reports on agent performance, including response time, errors, and system integration quality.
Document any issues encountered during agent development and maintenance with solutions implemented.
5. System Maintenance & Optimization
Monitor and ensure the smooth operation of deployed agents, including scaling and troubleshooting.
Optimize agent performance by refining workflows and identifying areas for improvement.
Handle the periodic maintenance of agents, including updates, bug fixes, and improvements.
6. Collaboration & Communication
Collaborate with the team to discuss and improve agent designs, workflows, and integrations.
Communicate regularly on progress, challenges, and any roadblocks faced during development.
Participate in team meetings to review current workflows and suggest improvements based on learnings.
7. Learning & Research
Stay updated on the latest features and updates in the n8n framework.
Experiment with new functionalities and integrations within the n8n ecosystem to enhance automation capabilities.
Actively learn about AI-driven workflows and explore opportunities for advanced agent development.

Title: Robotics
Description:
SelecteInstruction and Facilitation:
Deliver engaging and interactive STEM lessons in a classroom or workshop setting.
Explain complex concepts in an accessible manner and encourage student participation through discussions and group activities.

Demonstrations and Experiments:
Set up and conduct science experiments, engineering challenges, and technological demonstrations that captivate students' interest.
Explain the scientific principles behind experiments and encourage students to observe and analyse results.

Technology Integration:
Incorporate digital tools, simulations, and educational technology to enhance learning experiences and demonstrate real-world applications of STEM concepts.

Problem-Solving and Critical Thinking:
Engage students in activities that promote problem-solving, critical thinking, and creativity.
Guide students through analysing problems, exploring multiple solutions, and making evidence-based decisions.

Collaboration and Teamwork:
Organise group projects and activities that encourage collaboration, communication, and teamwork among students.
Foster an inclusive and supportive learning environment that values diverse perspectives.

Assessment and Progress Tracking:
Assess student understanding through quizzes, assignments, and practical assessments.
Provide constructive feedback to help students improve their grasp of STEM concepts.

Professional Development:
Stay updated on the latest advancements in STEM education, teaching methodologies, and instructional technologies.

Qualifications and Requirements:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in a Electronics.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to convey complex concepts in an engaging and comprehensible manner.
Proven experience working with robotics systems, including programming, assembly, and troubleshooting.
Familiarity with simulation software and virtual training environments is a plus.
Strong organisational skills and attention to detail in curriculum execution.
Prior experience in teaching, training, or mentoring is desirable.

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design, edit, and refine prompts tailored for various use cases and language models
2. Develop multi-step prompt workflows by breaking down complex tasks into smaller, logical subtasks
3. Create and run automated benchmarks using Python to evaluate model performance based on accuracy, cost, and latency
4. Build Python-based scaffolding to integrate LLM outputs into usable features and product pipelines
5. Combine traditional NLP techniques (regex, spaCy, NLTK) with LLMs to enhance processing, efficiency, and output quality
6. Conduct A/B testing, analyze output samples, and iterate based on edge cases and failure points
7. Optimize prompt chains and model outputs to meet KPIs such as quality, relevance, length, and compute efficiency
8. Stay informed about advancements in GPT, Claude, Gemini, and other open-source LLMs
9. Develop or utilize tools to test prompts, log outputs, and compare results efficiently
10. Maintain well-documented logs of prompts, workflows, test outcomes, and key learnings for future reference

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
Join our fast-paced early-stage startup as a Data Engineering Intern and gain hands-on experience building the data infrastructure that powers next-generation AI models. You'll work alongside a world-class team of engineers from Stanford and IIT, learning to design and implement scalable data pipelines, crawlers, and extraction systems while contributing to real-world projects.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in building data pipelines and learn best practices for handling large-scale data processing
2. Develop web crawlers and API integrations under mentorship from senior engineers
3. Support data extraction and transformation projects for AI model training
4. Gain exposure to cloud infrastructure and learn how to scale data systems
5. Help implement monitoring and observability for data pipeline health
6. Contribute to real projects that directly impact our AI model performance
7. Participate in code reviews and learn from experienced engineers

What we're looking for:

1. Educational Background: currently pursuing computer science, data science, or related field (Bachelor's or Master's)
2. Strong academic foundation in programming and data structures
3. Technical Skills: Solid Python programming skills (coursework or personal projects), basic understanding of databases and SQL, familiarity with data structures and algorithms, basic knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) - coursework or personal exploration, and experience with AI/ML tools (GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT for coding) is a plus

What you'll gain:

1. Real-world experience building production data systems
2. Mentorship from world-class engineers
3. Deep understanding of AI infrastructure and data engineering
4. Industry connections and potential full-time opportunities
5. Portfolio projects that showcase your skills to future employers
6. Competitive internship stipend

Ready to Launch Your Career? If you're excited about learning data engineering while contributing to cutting-edge AI infrastructure, we'd love to hear from you. This is your opportunity to gain invaluable experience in a high-growth startup environment with exceptional mentors.

Title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Description:
As an SEO Intern at Wittypen, you'll work closely with the SEO and Content teams to boost our organic visibility and help drive traffic to our website and blog. You'll get hands-on experience with real-time SEO strategies that impact growth.

Your key responsibilities:

Conduct keyword research using tools like Google Keyword Planner, Ahrefs, or Ubersuggest
Assist in optimizing existing web pages and blog content for SEO
Publish SEO content on CMS platforms (like WordPress), ensuring proper formatting, interlinking, and metadata
Perform on-page SEO tasks such as meta tags, image optimization, internal linking, and content formatting
Help identify and fix basic technical SEO issues (broken links, redirects, etc.)
Monitor and analyze website performance using Google Analytics and Google Search Console
Research competitors to uncover keyword gaps and content opportunities
Support in backlink research and outreach initiatives
Stay updated with SEO trends and best practices

What We're Looking For:

You don't need years of experience   just a curious mind, a love for content, and the willingness to learn. Here's what we expect:
Basic understanding of SEO and how search engines work
Strong research skills and attention to detail
Familiarity with Google Search Console, Google Analytics, or SEO tools is a plus
Comfortable working with content-heavy websites and CMS tools (WordPress preferred)
Good communication and writing skills
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively
Bonus: If you've taken an SEO course or have a blog/website of your own

What You'll Get:

Hands-on SEO experience with an active content-focused brand
Exposure to real tools, real problems, and real growth strategies
Certificate and Letter of Recommendation at the end of the internship
Opportunity to convert to a full-time role based on performance
Mentorship from experienced marketers and content professionals

Title: Software Development
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop STM32 firmware in C/C++ (bare-metal/RTOS) using STM32CubeIDE/HAL.

3. Design QT-based HMI interfaces for embedded Linux systems.
4. Write peripheral drivers (UART, SPI, I2C, CAN) for STM32.
5. Debug embedded systems using JTAG, oscilloscopes, and logic analyzers.

9. Integrate sensors/actuators with STM32 and Linux.
10. Learn and apply industrial protocols (Modbus, CANopen) as needed.

Title: UI/UX Design
Description:
At Ayu Devices Private Limited we're reimagining healthcare through innovative, homegrown MedTech solutions. Born out of cutting-edge research at IIT Bombay, we're committed to early diagnosis and smarter monitoring - making healthcare more accessible, accurate, and impactful. Our flagship product, AyuSynk, is a smart digital stethoscope that helps doctors track vital signs and health data in real time. It's more than just a device - it's a step toward personalized care, informed decisions, and better patient outcomes.

We're looking for a creative and driven UI/UX Design Intern to join our design team. If you're someone who loves building intuitive, delightful digital experiences and wants to contribute to a product that truly helps people   this is your place.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design wireframes, user flows, prototypes, and interfaces with a strong focus on usability and clean aesthetics.
2. Conduct user research and gather insights to inform design decisions.
3. Participate in brainstorming sessions and share fresh, user-centered ideas.
4. Create responsive designs that reflect our brand identity and support real-world medical use cases.
5. Work with cross-functional teams to turn requirements into simple, effective design solutions.
6. Iterate designs based on usability testing and feedback.
7. Stay up to date with trends, tools, and best practices in UI/UX.

What makes you a great fit:

1. Completed a degree or certification in UI/UX, Design, HCI, or a related field.
2. Strong proficiency in Figma (a must!).
3. Bonus points if you've used After Effects, Lottie, Rive, or ProtoPie.
4. A portfolio that shows your design thinking and problem-solving skills   personal, freelance, or academic projects are all welcome.
5. Great communication and collaboration skills   you can explain your design decisions clearly.
6. A curious, proactive mindset with a hunger to learn and grow.
7. Passion for solving real-world challenges through thoughtful design.

Why join us?

1. Hands-on experience designing for real users in the healthcare-tech space.
2. Work alongside experienced designers and a cross-functional team committed to building great products.
3. Real-world projects involving AI, IoT, and MedTech innovation.
4. A chance to contribute to solutions that have a genuine impact on people's lives.
5. A fun, collaborative, and growth-oriented environment that values creativity and purpose.

Come build with us. If you're excited about design, innovation, and creating better healthcare experiences   this is your chance to make a difference.
Apply now and be part of our mission at AyuSynk.ai to transform how care is delivered, one screen at a time.

1. Collaborate with the marketing team to create and implement customer acquisition strategies
2. Identify target audiences and devise outreach plans to engage new supporters
3. Manage social media platforms to increase visibility and engagement
4. Assist in the creation of compelling content for various online channels
5. Foster relationships with existing supporters, explore new opportunities for engagement, and find max donors
6. Attend virtual or local events to represent the NGO and attract potential supporters
7. Track and analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of acquisition campaigns
8. Provide insights and recommendations for continuous improvement

Title: Online Elementary Education For School Kids.
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Conduct online interactive classes during the daytime.
2. Conduct assessments.
3. Conduct PTMs.

Title: Accounts
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in preparing financial statements and reports.
2. Perform data entry and maintain accurate financial records.
3. Conduct financial analysis and provide insights to improve business performance.
4. Support in budgeting and forecasting activities.
5. Collaborate with the finance team on ad-hoc projects.
6. Utilize MS-Excel to analyze and present financial data.
7. Learn and grow in a supportive and nurturing work environment.

Title: Social Entrepreneurship
Description:
Are you passionate about creating social impact while developing entrepreneurial skills? Join Pawzz as a Social Entrepreneurship Intern, where you will work at the intersection of fundraising, community outreach, and business strategy to drive sustainable growth for a cause. This role is designed for self-driven individuals who want to learn how to maximize existing resources, develop new opportunities, and generate revenue through innovative strategies.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop and implement innovative fundraising strategies to attract donors and increase revenue.
2. Identify and engage with potential supporters, sponsors, and corporate partners.
3. Leverage digital platforms, email outreach, and social media marketing to promote ongoing campaigns.
4. Expand Pawzz's reach by networking with individuals, universities, and communities.
5. Design and execute impact-driven campaigns to build a sustainable fundraising model.
6. Maintain and update donor and prospect databases for efficient follow-ups.
7. Strategically market Pawzz's initiatives, ensuring long-term donor retention.

Perks:

1. Gain hands-on experience in social impact strategy, fundraising, donor relations, and sustainable development, equipping you with entrepreneurial skills for nonprofit and social enterprise growth.
2. Upon successful completion of your role, receive a valuable LOR and experience certificate to strengthen your resume.
3. Play an active role in developing innovative fundraising campaigns, building partnerships, and driving long-term impact through creative outreach strategies.
4. Earn a stipend based on your contributions to fundraising and community engagement efforts.

This internship offers a unique opportunity to develop business acumen while creating a meaningful impact. If you're eager to learn, innovate, and contribute to a social cause, apply now and become a part of a mission that drives change!

Title: Rockstar Video Editor (WFH)
Description:
Are you a creative genius with a passion for video editing? We are looking for a video editing rock star (intern) to join our team at ScaleMyStartup! As an intern, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting global projects and gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced environment.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in editing and producing high-quality videos for our marketing campaigns.
2. Collaborate with our creative team to brainstorm ideas and concepts for video content.
3. Edit raw footage to create engaging and visually appealing videos that align with our brand.
4. Add music, sound effects, and animations to enhance the overall quality of the videos.
5. Ensure all videos are delivered on time and meet our company's standards for quality.
6. Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in video editing to continuously improve your skills.
7. Provide feedback and suggestions for ways to improve our video content and processes.

If you are a self-motivated individual with a keen eye for detail and a strong passion for video editing, we want to hear from you! Join us on this exciting journey and take your video editing skills to the next level. Apply now to be our next Video Editing Rockstar (Intern)!

Title: Digital Marketing
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Make a monthly content calendar.
2. Activate the LinkedIn Page and regular posting on the same.

Title: Junior UI/UX Designer (Fresher)
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Collaborate with the product and development teams to design intuitive UI for web and mobile platforms
2. Create wireframes, mockups, user flows, and high-fidelity UI designs in  Figma
3. Design visual assets, icons, and marketing creatives using  Adobe Illustrator
4. Apply strong attention to detail in layout, alignment, spacing, and typography
5. Ensure consistency in branding, design systems, and user experience across all screens
6. Receive and implement feedback quickly while maintaining design quality
7. Contribute creative ideas that enhance user experience and visual engagement

Title: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Description:
As an artificial intelligence (AI) intern at Coding Junior, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and gain hands-on experience in the field of AI. If you are proficient in Python, data structures, machine learning, data science, neural networks, natural language processing (NLP), and deep learning, this internship is perfect for you.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in developing AI models and algorithms to solve complex problems.
2. Conduct research on AI technologies and trends to provide insights for project development.
3. Collaborate with team members to design and implement AI solutions.
4. Test and optimize AI models to ensure accuracy and efficiency.
5. Analyze and interpret data to extract meaningful insights for decision-making.
6. Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and implement best practices.
7. Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner. 

Join us at Coding Junior and take your AI skills to the next level!

Title: Graphic Design
Description:
Are you a creative individual with a passion for graphic design and video editing? Sorted.inc is seeking a talented graphic design intern to join our dynamic team! As an intern, you will have the opportunity to work with industry professionals, enhance your skills, and gain valuable hands-on experience in a fast-paced environment.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Collaborate with the design team to create engaging visual content for social media, website, and marketing materials.
2. Assist in the production of videos, including editing footage, adding music, and creating animations.
3. Use Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to design graphics, logos, and other visual elements.
4. Contribute innovative ideas and concepts to enhance the company's brand image.
5. Maintain organized files and assets, ensuring all designs are easily accessible for future projects.
6. Stay up-to-date with current design trends and techniques to consistently produce high-quality work.
7. Take on additional tasks and projects as needed to support the team and company goals.

If you are a motivated self-starter with a strong eye for detail and a desire to learn and grow in the field of graphic design, we want to hear from you! Join Sorted.inc and unleash your creativity today. Apply now!

Title: CA Articleship
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Manage ROC-related work, including filings and compliance requirements.
2. Handle GST and Income Tax-related tasks, ensuring accurate filings and adherence to regulations.
3. Facilitate corporate funding processes, including preparing project reports and conducting stock audits.

Title: Software Development
Description:
You should be a champion in using AI to build products. It's okay that you may not have all the knowledge, but please apply even if you know one thing well. We are hiring for multiple positions, and you are not expected to know everything. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Understand the requirements and create workable prototypes. 
2. Develop applications in the MERN (MongoDB, React, Node.js, Next.js) stack technologies or Flutter ( Android, iOS ), whichever is suitable for you.
3. End-to-End Development and Deployment Skills. Git, AWS
4. Write bug-free, clean and understandable code. 
5. Collaborate with other senior developers.

We are looking for multiple positions. You may be a full-stack engineer, a Flutter engineer, or just an engineer who wants to learn. Please do apply. We will evaluate your application and get back to you. Please don't forget to add a cover letter.

Title: Front End Development
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design & develop slick, user-friendly UIs that work beautifully across devices
2. Hook up real-time APIs to bring IoT dashboards, devices, and data to life
3. Build dynamic visualizations (think real-time graphs, alerts, device status, etc.)
4. Collaborate with designers & backend devs to bring seamless, intuitive UX to users
5. Optimize performance for live IoT data streams & massive datasets
6. Ensure mobile-first & cross-browser compatibility so things "just work" everywhere
7. Write clean, testable code and contribute to our reusable UI component library
8. Participate in code reviews and level up your frontend engineering skills

Mindset we love:

1. You're curious, self-driven, and love picking up new tools & frameworks on the fly
2. You care about design as much as code: pixel-perfect meets functional
3. You believe in writing clean, modular, and testable code
4. You're proactive and not afraid to ask questions or suggest better solutions
5. You love building things that people use: and seeing your work go live
6. You thrive in fast-paced environments where you can learn and ship fast

Title: Online Marathi Faculty For School Kids.
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Create online interactive Marathi classes.
2. Conduct daily lessons according to SCERT.
3. Focus on doubt-solving.
4. Communicate regularly with parents.

Title: AWS DevOps Engineer
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

Handle specific responsibilities as assigned by the team.
Learn and use containerization technologies.
Work with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.

Title: Travel Agent – IATA Qualified (Amadeus GDS)
Description:
We are looking for a  confident and experienced IATA-certified travel agent  to support our growing online travel agency. You must be skilled in  Amadeus GDS  (or any major GDS) and able to work independently to manage bookings and apply for our  IATA GoLite or GoStandard accreditation.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Apply for IATA GoLite or GoStandard accreditation
2. Handle flight bookings using  Amadeus GDS
3. Build relationships with airline partners and Amadeus support teams
4. Communicate fluently and professionally in  English
5. Work independently and take initiative in all areas of your role

Title: Software Engineering (React Native)
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native and TypeScript.
2. Ensure cross-platform compatibility and smooth functionality.
3. Work with APIs to integrate backend services into the app.
4. Identify and fix performance issues.

Title: Software Engineering (Python, React)
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Develop high-quality applications using React (TypeScript) and Python (Flask).
2. Assist with database modeling and management (SQL or NoSQL).
3. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following object-oriented programming principles.
4. Collaborate with the team to design and implement RESTful APIs.
5. Contribute to the creation and maintenance of automated tests to ensure code quality.
6. Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
7. Work in an Agile environment, contributing to sprint planning and retrospectives.

Title: Social Media Growth Strategist & Content Creator
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Develop viral content strategies aimed at rapidly increasing followers, views, and engagement across Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and YouTube.
2. Create high-impact reels, posts, and stories tailored to current trends, challenges, and audience emotions to maximize shareability.
3. Plan and execute content calendars with a focus on high-frequency posting and campaign-based growth bursts.
4. Research viral trends, hooks, and formats daily and implement them creatively in NGO-related content.
5. Optimize content using data insights, A/B testing, and platform algorithms to boost organic reach and follower growth.
6. Build and manage an engaged community by replying to DMs, comments, and encouraging user-generated content and shares.

Title: Embedded Systems
Location: Coimbatore, Erode, Madurai, Tirunelveli, Kanyakumari, Namakkal, Dharmapuri, Salem
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Deliver training programs on embedded systems and IoT technologies using provided content materials to ensure effective learning experiences for students.
2. Conduct hands-on practical sessions and laboratory exercises to give students real-world experience.
3. Provide individual guidance and mentorship to students, helping them understand concepts, solve technical problems, and complete their projects.

Title: Travel & Tourism
Company: Royal Tour & Travel India Private Limited
Location: Chennai, Delhi, Ghaziabad, Gorakhpur, Gurgaon, Indore, Lucknow, Hyderabad, Bhopal, Mumbai, Noida, Allahabad, Bangalore, Kanpur Dehat, Varanasi
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assisting in preparing domestic and international tour itineraries and quotations
2. Handling client inquiries via email, phone, and WhatsApp with prompt and professional communication
3. Coordinating with airlines, hotels, and transport partners for bookings and follow-ups
4. Supporting the visa documentation process for travelers
5. Creating and posting engaging content on social media platforms for travel promotions
6. Maintaining records of bookings, client details, and lead conversions
7. Researching trending destinations and updating internal knowledge base
8. Participating in internal meetings and training sessions
9. Assisting walk-in clients at the office and providing information about available packages
10. Preparing travel brochures and presentation materials for corporate clients

Title: Machine Learning
Description:
CareerNest is a forward-thinking career development platform aimed at empowering students and professionals through practical training and career-building programs. We help individuals gain in-demand skills through real-world projects, mentorship, and hands-on experience across tech, business, and creative domains.

We are looking for passionate and curious minds to join our machine learning internship program. You will work closely with our data science team to develop, test, and deploy ML models to solve real-world problems.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Build and optimize machine learning models for classification, regression, clustering, etc.
2. Preprocess and clean large datasets for use in model training and evaluation.
3. Work with tools such as Python, scikit-learn, TensorFlow/PyTorch, Pandas, NumPy, etc.
4. Assist in developing APIs or dashboards to showcase model results.
5. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deploy ML solutions.
6. Document and present findings regularly.

Title: Data Specialist
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 

1. Accurately enter data into company databases, spreadsheets, and software systems.
2. Verify and update existing data, ensuring all records are current and error-free.
Review and correct data discrepancies or errors.
3. Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion.
4. Organize and categorize information in a clear and accessible manner.
5. Ensure data integrity and accuracy by performing routine quality checks.
6. Assist with data analysis and report generation when necessary.
7. Collaborate with other team members to ensure data is consistent across all platforms.
8. Meet deadlines and performance targets for data entry speed and accuracy.

Title: Online Precalaclus Tutor With More Than One Yer Experience
Company: Narigiri's Connect To Universe Private Limited
Description:
Are you a skilled and experienced online precalculus tutor with over one year of experience? Narigiri's Connect To Universe Private Limited is seeking a dynamic individual who possesses strong knowledge in mathematics, online teaching, and English Proficiency (Spoken and Written) to join our team. As a valued member of our company, you will have the opportunity to work with students from diverse backgrounds and help them excel in their precalculus studies. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Conduct online precalculus tutoring sessions with students using interactive tools and resources.
2. Create customized lesson plans tailored to meet the individual learning needs of each student.
3. Provide timely feedback and assessment on student progress to facilitate continuous improvement.
4. Maintain a positive and engaging learning environment to enhance student motivation and participation.
5. Communicate effectively with students and parents to address any concerns or questions related to precalculus concepts.
6. Stay updated on the latest trends and developments in precalculus education to ensure high-quality tutoring services.
7. Collaborate with team members to share best practices and contribute to the overall success of the tutoring program. 

If you are passionate about teaching and have a strong background in precalculus, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity to make a difference in the lives of students. Join us in empowering the next generation of learners and help them connect to the universe of knowledge.

Title: Social Work
Description:
We are looking for passionate and dedicated social work interns to join our mission-driven team. This role offers a unique opportunity to actively contribute to social work initiatives, including impactful fundraising, marketing campaigns, and revenue generation. Your efforts will help expand engagement for our organization and our partner NGOs. The primary goal is to create a far-reaching impact by spreading awareness of our mission and initiatives, reaching as many people as possible.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Community engagement: Increase community engagement and interaction, driving greater support for our initiatives.
2. Philanthropy: Develop and manage philanthropy campaigns, focusing on engaging and retaining current donors. Use data-driven strategies to maintain strong relationships with our donor base.
3. Outreach activities: Conduct outreach efforts to raise awareness about our organization, its mission, and our partner NGOs, maximizing our reach.

Title: Fundraising
Description:
As a fundraising intern at Pawzz, you will have the exciting opportunity to contribute to our mission of helping furry friends in need. With your English proficiency, digital marketing skills, and knowledge of economics, you will play a crucial role in expanding our fundraising efforts and growing our impact. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in developing and implementing fundraising campaigns to drive donations and support for our cause
2. Utilize social media platforms and Instagram marketing to increase brand awareness and engage our audience
3. Collaborate with the sales team to identify potential donors and sponsors for partnership opportunities
4. Conduct business analysis to assess fundraising performance and identify areas for improvement
5. Work closely with the marketing team to create engaging content for fundraising initiatives
6. Research and stay up to date on fundraising trends and best practices in the industry
7. Provide support in organizing fundraising events and activities to raise funds for our organization

Title: Marketing Associate
Description:
Marketing in the social sector is more than just visibility- it's about building trust, inspiring action, and creating lasting impact. As a marketing associate intern at Pawzz, you will play a key role in amplifying our voice, marketing ongoing campaigns, and shaping the positive image of the organization. Your efforts will directly contribute to donor outreach, increased fundraising, and connecting more people to the cause of animal welfare.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Develop and execute marketing strategies for ongoing campaigns.
2. Create engaging content and promotional materials for outreach programs.
3. Maintain positive PR and brand image of Pawzz across digital platforms.
4. Collaborate with the outreach and fundraising teams to ensure campaign success.
5. Track and analyze marketing performance to improve donor conversion rates.

Note: This internship is brought to you by the Pawzz Foundation. Your work on this platform may overlap with some common work elements.

Title: N/A
Description: N/A

Title: Social Impact
Description:
Are you passionate about driving meaningful change and making a tangible impact in the social sector? Join Pawzz as a Social Impact Intern, where you will play a key role in community outreach, fundraising, and program development to support animal welfare initiatives. This internship will equip you with hands-on experience in social impact strategy, stakeholder engagement, and resource mobilization, ensuring both personal and organizational growth.

This role is ideal for individuals who are proactive, creative, and committed to making a difference through structured and sustainable impact-driven initiatives.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design and implement social impact initiatives to support fundraising and community engagement.
2. Develop strategies to strengthen donor relationships and community partnerships.
3. Conduct research on best practices in social impact and apply insights to Pawzz's initiatives.
4. Leverage storytelling and digital outreach to create awareness and increase donor participation.
5. Assist in program monitoring, evaluation, and reporting on social impact progress.

Title: Social Outreach
Description:
Join our team as a social outreach intern and play a key role in driving social impact and sustainable change through innovative funding and engagement strategies. This internship opportunity offered by our NGO focuses on leveraging your communication skills and entrepreneurial spirit to raise funds and foster collaboration between our organization and its affiliated NGOs. As an intern in the field of social entrepreneurship, you will have the opportunity to contribute to meaningful projects while gaining valuable experience in social entrepreneurship and nonprofit management.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Work on fundraising campaigns: Work with team members to plan, execute, and evaluate fundraising campaigns aimed at generating financial support for the organization and partner NGOs. Raise funds and engage with supporters using a variety of channels, including social media.
2. Explore opportunities for collaboration, joint initiatives, and resource sharing to maximize social value creation.
3. Work on social innovation: Generate innovative ideas and solutions to address social and environmental challenges.
4. Handle community engagement: Work with our organization's supporters, volunteers, and beneficiaries to foster a sense of community and belonging.
5. Work on the global perspective: Stay informed about global trends, best practices, and new opportunities in social entrepreneurship and nonprofit management.

Note: This internship is brought to you by the Pawzz Foundation. Your work on this platform may overlap with some common work elements.

Title: Program Assistant
Description:
Join our team as a program assistant intern and contribute to meaningful initiatives aimed at creating positive social impact. This internship opportunity, provided by our NGO, focuses on fundraising, marketing, and sales efforts to support our programs. As a program assistant intern, you will play a vital role in raising funds, promoting our projects, and engaging with supporters through various channels, including social media. 

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Creative contribution strategies: Design and implement innovative approaches to increase donation support and optimize contribution outcomes.
2. Marketing collaboration: Partner with the marketing team to promote our programs and initiatives across multiple channels, with a strong focus on social media.
3. Donor relations: Build and nurture meaningful connections with donors and supporters through personalized outreach, ensuring continued support.
4. Philanthropy: Develop and oversee philanthropy campaigns that emphasize donor loyalty. Utilize data-driven methods to sustain strong relationships with our donor community.
5. Social media management: Oversee and elevate our social media presence on platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn to expand our reach.

Note: This internship is brought to you by the Pawzz Foundation. Your work on this platform may overlap with some common work elements.

Description:

1. Work on invoice generation 
2. Work on income & expenses report
3. Work on TDS, GST and ITR Filing

2. Curating reels for Instagram
