Title: Content and Social Media Marketing
Description:
Are you passionate about creating engaging content and driving brand awareness through social media? Are you well-versed in SEO strategies and data analysis? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you as a Content and Social Media Marketing intern at Pixlr Innovations Private Limited!

1. Develop and execute creative content strategies to increase brand visibility and engagement.
2. Optimize content for SEO to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic.
3. Manage social media accounts and create compelling posts to attract and engage our target audience.
4. Analyze data to track the performance of our marketing efforts and make data-driven decisions.
5. Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm new ideas and strategies for growth.
6. Stay up-to-date on the latest trends in content marketing, social media, and SEO.
7. Assist in other marketing tasks and projects as needed to support the overall marketing goals of the company.

If you are a proactive and creative individual looking to gain valuable experience in the world of digital marketing, apply now to join our dynamic team at Pixlr Innovations!

Title: Business Development (Sales)
Description:
As a Business Development (Sales) intern at Recruitment Mantra, you will have the opportunity to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment where you can hone your skills in English Proficiency (Spoken) and Digital Marketing. 

Key Responsibilities:
1. Assist in prospecting and identifying new business opportunities through various channels.
2. Conduct market research to identify potential clients and develop targeted outreach strategies.
3. Support the sales team in creating and delivering compelling sales presentations.
4. Collaborate with the marketing team to create digital marketing campaigns aimed at attracting new clients.
5. Assist in maintaining and updating the CRM system with accurate and up-to-date information.
6. Provide administrative support to the sales team, including scheduling meetings and managing correspondence.
7. Participate in team meetings and brainstorming sessions to contribute ideas for business growth and development. 

If you are a motivated and ambitious individual looking to gain hands-on experience in sales and digital marketing, this internship is perfect for you. Join our team at Recruitment Mantra and kickstart your career in business development!

Title: Graphic Design
Description:
Are you a creative individual with a passion for graphic design? Join our team at Salaar Media as a Graphic Design intern and bring your skills in Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, CorelDRAW, Adobe Creative Suite, Adobe InDesign, UI & UX Design, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC to the forefront.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Collaborate with the design team to create visually appealing graphics for various projects
2. Assist in the creation of marketing materials, social media content, and website designs
3. Work on video editing projects using Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects
4. Utilize CorelDRAW for creating vector graphics and illustrations
5. Develop user-friendly interfaces and engaging user experiences through UI & UX design
6. Support the team in photo editing and enhancement using Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC
7. Stay updated on industry trends and software advancements to bring fresh ideas to the table.

If you are eager to learn, grow, and showcase your talent in a dynamic media company, apply now and be part of our innovative team!

Title: Web Development
Description:
Are you a passionate and talented web developer looking to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced media company? Salaar Media is seeking a Web Development intern who is proficient in React, JavaScript, Node.js, PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, jQuery, WordPress, Bootstrap, Next.js, and MongoDB.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Collaborate with our team to design and develop dynamic and interactive websites and applications.
2. Implement and maintain front-end and back-end functionalities using the latest technologies.
3. Optimize websites for speed and performance to enhance user experience.
4. Troubleshoot and debug issues to ensure seamless functionality across various platforms.
5. Assist in updating and maintaining existing websites and platforms.

Education: Any Bachelor's Degree (Preferred: Business, Marketing, IT, or related fields)
Stipend: Competitive (performance-based incentives may apply)

Requirements:
Fluent in English (spoken and written)
Strong communication skills (both written and verbal) with a confident and persuasive phone presence.
Basic understanding of cloud technology.
Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and comfortable working independently.
Willingness to learn quickly, especially about cloud technology and SaaS solutions
Basic familiarity with tools like MS Office, Apollo, and email platforms.
Bachelor's degree or equivalent (preferred but not mandatory).

Responsibilities:
Conduct market and lead research to identify potential customers.
Reach out to prospects via calls, emails, and LinkedIn to generate interest.
Assist in qualifying leads and scheduling meetings for the sales team.
Maintain accurate records of outreach and follow-ups in CRM tools.
Collaborate with the sales and marketing team for campaign execution.
Stay updated on cloud trends, AWS offerings, and industry use cases.
Support the sales team in preparing sales pitches, decks, and follow-ups.
Learn and apply best practices for SaaS and cloud solution selling.


What We Offer:
Comprehensive training and onboarding to set you up for success.
Competitive stipend with performance-based incentives.
Opportunity to work closely with experienced professionals
Growth opportunities within a fast-paced, innovative company.
Supportive team environment and collaboration.


About Company :
CloudZenia is a leading AWS Advanced Partner Specializing in Cloud, DevOps, and Gen AI solutions. We help businesses scale, Optimize, and automate their cloud infrastructure while delivering cutting-edge AI-driven insights and customer engagement solutions.
Join us in revolutionising cloud and AI adoption across industries.

Title: Media & Public Relations (PR)
Description:
We're looking for a PR-savvy Journalism intern who loves the buzz of media and storytelling. If you've got a nose for news, know how to write sharp pitches, and even better   have connections with local or national media houses   this role is for you. Your work will help amplify our story, secure high-impact features, and open doors to new collaborations.

Key Responsibilities
- Identify relevant journalists, editors, bloggers, and media platforms for coverage
- Craft personalized media pitches and follow-ups for print, digital, and broadcast media
- Coordinate with the content writer (in-house) or write/review/edit press releases, founder bios, and pitch decks for media circulation
- Track ongoing media opportunities in sustainability, social impact, and startup beats
- Help with bylines, feature story ideas, and op-ed placements for the founder
- Build and maintain a database of PR contacts and outreach status
- Support the team in preparing for interviews, features, and podcast requests

What We're Looking For
- Background in journalism, PR, mass communication, or media studies
- Strong writing and communication skills
- Ability to research and reach out to the right media stakeholders
- Familiarity with media landscapes in India (hyperlocal and national). If you have visibility of Singapore and London media houses - that's a bonus!

Bonus: You've previously helped startups/social ventures get featured or know someone in the industry

Why Join Us?
- Get published and build your PR/media portfolio
- Work directly with the founder and marketing team on high-impact stories
- Opportunity to convert to a full-time communications role based on performance
- Get exposure to the intersection of media, sustainability, and startups
